yasya tādṛśaṃ yatkṛtrimarūpaiḥ padātyādibhir āracitaṃ caturasratāśrayāṃ catuṣkoṇatvaviṣayāṃ
śobhāṃ bibharti | sāmarthyāc caturaṅgaphalakam_ | tadaṣṭāpadaṃ neti ca virodhaḥ | tasya hi paṅktau
paṅktau padāṣṭakopetatvād aṣṭāpadam iti saṃjñā | atra tathāśabdaḥ samuccaye | pūrvavākyāpekṣayā
yadyapi lakṣmīṃ dadhataṃ tathāpi ripum anaṣṭāpadam evākarod iti tv ekavākyatāyām anvayo na yujyate
vākyabhede | evaṃ jātīyakasyobhayābhīṣṭatvāt_ | ‘yadyapy asis trijagatījayalabdhakīrtiḥ kveyaṃ
tathāpi raṇalampaṭatā hatā te | saṅgrāmamūrdhni bhaṭamuṣṭigate kṛpāṇe kiṃ jñāyate śrayati kaṃ
capalā jayaśrīḥ ||’ iti || 9 ||

lg.l: sarūpabhāve 'py aparājayakṣmatāṃ dadhanmṛgāṅkaṃ viśinaṣṭi yo guṇaiḥ || 10 ||

div.p:
aparājayā parābhavaśūnyā kṣmā kṣitir yasya tadbhāvaṃ bi
bhradya induṃ viśinaṣṭi atiśete | guṇaiḥ sārūpye 'pi sati nahīndur apagato rājayakṣmā kṣa
yavyādhir yasya tadbhāvaṃ bibharti | tasya satataṃ tadākrāntatvāt_ | ānandaṃ karotīty ānanda
karaḥ | ānandāś cānandahetavaḥ karā raśmayo yasya saḥ | kalā lekhā api || 10 ||

lg.l: babhāra sadrāghimacārutārakaṃ praveṣṭayor yaś ca dṛśor iva dvayam || 11 ||

div.p:
a
nekapānām ibhānāṃ kṣmā bhūmir yo 'hitasaṃgaro 'risaṅgrāmas tatrājitam_ | vikaṭāṃsaṃ mahāska
ndham_ | saha drādhimṇā dairghyeṇa vartate | cāru ramyam_ | tārayati tathā [bhayā]dvipado vā tā
rakaṃ śaraṇyam_ | praveṣṭau bhujau | anyatrānekena pakṣmaṇā āhitena saṅgena rājitam_ | vi
kaṭāṃ vistīrṇām_ | cārū tārake kanīnike yasyām_ || 11 ||

vipakṣatāṃ śatrutvaṃ vigatā
ṅgaruhatvaṃ ca | kṣamābhṛto rājānaḥ parvatāś ca | āsannena vadhenāturā duḥkhitā satī jitā
paribhūtā | sadbhir navair dhātubhir manaḥśilādyai rājitā ca || 12 ||

lg.l: kareṇa cakraṃ dadhad ujjvalena yaḥ puraṃdarasyāpy abhimānam ākṣipat |
raṇājiraṃ svargam ivātanodbalād apārijātaṃ puruṣottamo yathā || 13 ||

div.p:
apagatam arīṇāṃ jātaṃ sa
mūho yatra tādṛśaṃ yaḥ samarāṅgaṇam akarot_ | svargam iva hariḥ | tatpakṣe nāsti pārijāto
yatreti yojyam_ | puruṣottamo harir api || 13 ||
(kulakam_)

apakrametyādi kalāpakam_ | apakramo
vikramaḥ || 14 ||
aśmagarbhaṃ marakatam_ || 15 ||

jayaśrīrave sālabhañjikā stambhotkīrṇā
putrikā tasyāḥ | stambho bhujā yasya | bhīruḥ strī || 16 ||

bhāratī vāk_ | vāṅmayaṃ
śabdabrahma | pratāno vistāraḥ || 17 ||
(kalāpakam_)

lg.l: manoramā tasya mukhaṃ sarasvatī vasuṃdharāpīṭham iva vyabhūṣayat || 18 ||

div.p:
varṇāḥ kādaya eva komalatayā haṃsā viśuddhā
nirapaśabdās teṣāṃ saṃhatir yasyāḥ | viśuddhavarṇā ca sitarucir haṃsasaṃhatir yasyām_ | prasādaḥ
samarpakatvaṃ vimalatā ca | gāmbhīryam arthagauravam agādhatā ca | sarasvatī vāk_ kācin nadī
ca || 18 ||

lg.l: girānayā prastutam etad īdṛśaṃ tavāryakāryaṃ bahu manyate na kaḥ |
mṛṇālavallikusumaṃ tanoti tat karoti lakṣmīr api yan niketanam || 19 ||
vaco 'tra sarvasya manoramaṃ bhavānyad abhyadhāt tatra ka eva vismayaḥ |
yato bhavaty eva vivekaśālināṃ vipaścitāṃ prātijanīnavākyatā || 20 ||

div.p:
prātijanīnaṃ sarvajanayogyam_ | sādhvarthe ‘pratijanādibhyaḥ khañ_’ iti
khañ_ || 20 ||

lg.l: mamāvakāśo 'sti na vaktum ity avan bruve tathāpy āśritakāryagauravaḥ || 21 ||

div.p: samanta(sta)bhadraṃ sarvataḥ praśastam_ | avann avagacchan_ || 21 ||

lg.l: ayaṃ jaḍo 'smāt kuta eva nītimad vaco 'bhyudetīti na kalpanā kṣamā |
kim aśmano 'tyantamalīmasātmanaḥ suvarṇam akṣuṇṇaguṇaṃ na jāyate || 22 ||

div.p:
akṣu
ṇṇāḥ prabhūtā nirdoṣā vā || 22 ||

lg.l: prabhāsamānā gaṇanāthā dṛśyate na ratnadīpasya śikhā sakajjalā || 23 ||

div.p:
arthaḥ kāryaṃ ghaṭādiś ca bhāvaḥ | timiram ajñānam_ | pra
bhābhir hetubhir asamānā ananyasadṛśī || 23 ||

lg.l: abhīkṣṇam antaḥ sarasāny atandritāḥ suvṛttatāṃ bibhrati nītiśālinaḥ |
vitanvate saṃsadi kūrcakesaradrumāḥ phalānīva vacāṃsi sūrayaḥ || 24 ||

div.p:
raso vīrādbhūtādir jalaṃ ca | atandritā a
nalasāḥ | vṛttam ācaritaṃ vartulatvaṃ ca bibhrati bibhrāṇāni | kūrcakesarā nārikelāḥ
|| 24 ||

lg.l: samīkṣya samyagbhuvi kṛtyavastu yaḥ pratīkṣate deśabalādisādhanam |

div.p:
bhuvi svamaṇḍale | apacāro viruddhācaraṇam_ | vipākanīrasāḥ pariṇāmadurbhagāḥ
|| 25 ||

lg.l: pramādadoṣānupaghātasusthitaṃ na nītitulyaṃ kṣamam asti sādhanam || 26 ||

div.p: kṣamaṃ yogyam_ || 26 ||

lg.l: prayuktasaṃskāragurur garīyasāṃ vrajaty avasthaiva nanu pratīkṣyatām |
bhajaty upāvarjitatailasekayā nahi pradīpo daśayā vinā sthitim || 27 ||

div.p:
garīyasām avasthitiḥ saṃskāreṇa gurur eva pratīkṣyatāṃ
yāti | tam antareṇa suciraṃ tasyā abhāvāt_ | saṃskāraḥ śāstrādinā yogyatādhānam_ | u
pāvarjitaḥ kṛtaḥ || 27 ||

lg.l: tamoghane veśmani tiṣṭhato 'niśaṃ vrajaty aśeṣaṃ jagadandhakāritām || 28 ||
suradviṣāṃ nihnumahe na pauruṣaṃ na ca praśaṃsāṃ tanumas tathātmanaḥ |
nirūpayāmo nayavartma kevalaṃ yathābhilāṣās tu parasya vṛttayaḥ || 29 ||

div.p:
paro 'nyaḥ | tasya vṛttayo vyavahārā yathābhilāṣāḥ sva
cchandatayā vyāptāḥ || 29 ||

lg.l: aśeṣam unmīlayati kṣamābhṛtāṃ vicitrarūpā nanu nītitūlikā || 30 ||

div.p:
śubhavartiḥ sanmārgas tatra lekhā maryādā | śubhāyāś ca varter gairikā
digulikāyā lekhā rekhā | maṇḍalaṃ dvādaśarājako deśas tatra kāryaṃ tantrāvāpādikam_ | ma
ṇḍalaṃ ca sarvatobhadrādi tad eva kāryaṃ prayojanam_ | vicitrarūpā āścaryā | vividhasya cacitra
sya rūpaṃ yataḥ || 30 ||

cikitsakā bhiṣajaḥ | te yathā dravyasya pañcāvayavān rasavīryavipā
kaprabhāvasaṃyogān viviñcate vicārayanti tathā jigīṣavo mantrasya pañcaiva ‘karmaṇām ārambho
pāyaḥ’ ityādikān prayogān_ (pūrvoktān_) | pañca ca rasādayaḥ—‘rasāḥ svādvamlalavaṇati
ktoṣaṇakaṣāyakāḥ | vīryaṃ dravyasya taj jñeyaṃ yad yogāj jāyate kriyā || nāvīryaṃ kurute kiṃci
t sarvā vīryavatī hi sā | jāṭhareṇāgninā yogād yad udeti rasāntaram_ || rasānāṃ pariṇāmānte
sa vipāka iti smṛtaḥ | rasādisāmye yat karma viśiṣṭaṃ tat prabhāvajam_ ||’ saṃyogo dvayor ba
hūnāṃ vā dravyāṇāṃ sahitībhāvaḥ sanniveśam ārabhate | yathaikakaśo dravyāṇīti bhiṣakchāstreṣu
pratipāditāḥ || 31 ||

lg.l: na deśakālādivirodhi paṇḍitaiḥ praśasyate kāryam asādhukāvyavat || 32 ||

div.p:
apārthatā phalavirahaḥ | tad yuktaṃ karma na śastram_ | yad uktam_—
‘aphalāni durantāni samavyayaphalāni ca | aśakyāni ca kāryāṇi nārabheta vicakṣaṇaḥ ||’
iti | daśadāḍimādivākyavadasaṃgatārthatvaṃ cāpārthatā | akramaṃ vyutkramam aprayuktopāyaṃ krama
hīnārthaṃ ca | yathā—‘turagam athavā mātaṅgaṃ me prayaccha madālayam_’ iti | sasaṃśayaṃ saṃdigdhapha
lasiddhikaṃ saṃdigdhārthaṃ ca | yathā—‘sa bhāgyavaśān mahāpadam upāgataḥ’ iti | saṃdhihīnaṃ
prathamaguṇarahitaṃ virūpasaṃdhi ca | yathā—‘kamale iva locane ime anubadhnāti vilāsapa
ddhatiḥ’ iti | deśakālavirodhīty anena kārye prastute pañcāvayavamantrākaraṇaṃ pratipādyate
ty atra(?) lokaviruddhākhyo doṣaḥ | tatra hi deśavirodha evoktaḥ | deśakālasvabhāvaviru
ddhāni yathā—‘sva(sau)vīreṣv asti nagarī madhurā nāma viśrutā | akṣoṭanārikelāntā
yasyāḥ paryantabhūmayaḥ || kadambakusumasmeraṃ madhau vanam aśobhata ||’ iti || 32 ||

lg.l: bibharti pāriplavatām udanvatas tad ūrmisaṃsargakṛtām ivotthitā
avaimi lakṣmīr nayavartmanāgatā sthiraṃ nibadhnāti nṛpe padaṃ punaḥ || 33 ||

div.p:
lakṣmī
r abdher utthitatvāt taraṅgasaṃkrāntām iva niścitaṃ capalatāṃ vahati | nayamārgeṇa punar āgatā nṛ
patau sthiram āspadaṃ kurute || 33 ||

lg.l: sacetasaḥ kasya na vallabho 'rjane nayaprakāro 'para eva vā śriyaḥ || 34 ||

div.p:
nayaprakāro nītiprapañcaḥ śriyo 'rjane 'para evāpūrva e
vopāyaḥ, kasya vā na vallabhaḥ | pūrvavadudadher akadarthanāt surāsurāṇāṃ cāsaṃbhrānteḥ | ‘nayaḥ prakāraḥ’
iti tu hṛdayaṃgamaḥ pāṭhaḥ || 34 ||

lg.l: na nītiśāstropaniṣatsu pañcadhā sthitiṃ jahāty eṣa paraḥ pumān iva |

div.p:
śāstrāṇi upaniṣado vedāntāḥ | parasya puṃsaḥ pañcadhātvam a
nnaprāṇamanovijñānānandamayatvena | viparyaye durnaye mithyādṛṣṭau ca graho 'bhiniveśaḥ || 35 ||

lg.l: mṛṇālavallīva guṇān vihāya kiṃ vyanakti nītir jaḍasaṃkaroddhṛtā || 36 ||

div.p:
vi
bhajyamānā vibhāgenāsūtryamāṇā bhidyamānā ca | arthakovidaḥ kāryajñaḥ | granthayo bandhāḥ pa
rvāṇi ca | mantharo 'lasaḥ | guṇāḥ—‘saṃdhiṃ ca vigrahaṃ caiva yātrām āsanam eva ca | dvaidhībhāvaṃ saṃśrayaṃ
ca ṣaḍguṇān kavayo viduḥ ||’ iti saṃdhyādayaḥ, tantavaś ca | jaḍaṃ ca jalam_ | laḍayor ekatva
smaraṇāt_ || 36 ||

lg.l: upāyaśūnyās taravaḥ kṣitāv iva kriyāviśeṣā vyabhicāriṇaḥ phale |
ta eva nūnaṃ niyamena bhūbhṛtāṃ phalanti kalpadrumavannayāśrayāḥ || 37 ||

div.p: upāyāḥ sekādayo 'pi | bhūbhṛtaḥ parvatā api || 37 ||

abhyu
pāyāḥ sāmādaya evārāṇāṃ madhyakāṣṭhānāṃ saṃcayo yasya | virūḍhakramaḥ kāla eva nemi
r dhārā yasya | maṇḍalaṃ rāṣṭram eva nābhiś cakramadhyaṃ tasya bandhanam_ | yathānyato na yāti |
karaṇe lyuṭ_ | athavā ‘arir mittram arer mittraṃ mittramittram ataḥ param_ | tathārimittramitraṃ ca vi
jigīṣoḥ puraḥ smṛtam_ || pārṣṇigrāhas tataḥ paścād ākrandas tadanantaram_ | āsārāvanayo
ś caiva vijigīṣoś ca pṛṣṭhataḥ || areś ca vijigīṣoś ca madhyamo bhūmyanantaraḥ | anugrahe saṃha
tayoḥ samartho vyastayor vadhe || maṇḍalād bahir eteṣām udāsīno balādhikaḥ | anugrahe saṃha
tānāṃ vyastānāṃ ca vadhe prabhuḥ ||’ iti dvādaśarājako deśo maṇḍalam_ | tasya nābhir madhyava
rtī vijigīṣus tasya maṇḍalākṛteś ca nābheś cakramadhyasya bandhanaṃ sthairyādhāyakam_ | kāryāṇāṃ
cakraḥ samūhaṃ kāryam eva ca || 38 ||

lg.l: vyapekṣate bāhubalaṃ jigīṣataḥ sunītim ākrāntajagattrayaṃ dhruvam |

div.p: cakraṃ rathāṅgam_ || 39 ||

lg.l: sa nūnam uccaiḥ pada eva nītimān kṛtapratiṣṭho na cirād vibhāvyate || 40 ||

div.p:
padaṃ rājyaṃ sthānaṃ ca | na
cirād acireṇa || 40 ||

lg.l: narendralakṣmīr ucitair upakramaiḥ krameṇa tais tair gurubhiḥ prasādhitā |

div.p: upakramair upāyaiḥ | prasādhitā arjitā maṇḍitā ca || 41 ||

lg.l: prakāśa eva praviluptadarśano gataḥ kṣaṇād ghūka ivāndhyaviplavam |
na jātu kālaṃ matidurvidho jano bibharti sāmarthyam udarkam īkṣitum || 42 ||

div.p:
udarkam āgāminaṃ kālam īkṣituṃ matidurvidhaḥ prajñādaridro jano ghūka iva na samarthaḥ | ghūka
ulūkaḥ | so 'py udarkam uditārkaṃ kālam avalokayituṃ nālam_ | prakāśe prasiddhe vastuni
tamorahite ca | darśanaṃ jñānam avalokanaṃ ca | āndhyakṛto viplava upatāpaḥ || 42 ||

a
nukramāpakramāv anvayavyatirekau || 43 ||

mūlaṃ svadeśaḥ kandaṃ ca | koṣo 'rthasaṃpad abhya
ntaraṃ ca | daṇḍaḥ senā nālaṃ ca | pariṇāma āgāmī kālaḥ pakvatā ca || 44 ||

lg.l: vicinvato 'rthaṃ nijamaṇḍalāśrayaṃ guṇānupāyāṃś ca nṛpasya śaktayaḥ |
nimajjato vāriṇi tīvratejasaḥ saṭā vilumpanti harer jhaṣā api || 46 ||

div.p: jhaṣā matsyāḥ || 46 ||

lg.l: atītakālasya tadatra jṛmbhitaṃ tapasyam āse kariṇo 'pi durjayaḥ |
nidāghakāle mukhalāṅgalaḥ śunām api vrajaty eva nikāryatāṃ yataḥ || 47 ||

div.p:
mukhalāṅgalaḥ sūkaraḥ | sa śunām api grīṣme nikāryatāṃ paribhāva
nīyatvaṃ yad upayāti tad atītakālasya jṛmbhitam_ | kālātikramaṇasya phalaṃ tad ityarthaḥ |
nahi medasvitayā sūkarāṇāṃ grīṣmaḥ samucitaḥ kālaḥ | tapasyaḥ phālgunaḥ | kariṇa iti
kartur api saṃbandhitayā vivakṣaṇāt saṃbandhamātre ṣaṣṭhī | anyathā ‘na lokāvyaya—’ iti
tan niṣedhaḥ syāt_ || 47 ||

lg.l: mayūraketur vadanair ivādhikaṃ vibhāti ṣaḍbhir nayavistaro guṇaiḥ || 48 ||

div.p:
pakṣāḥ svavargyā aṅgaruhāś ca | bhūmibhṛdrājā krauñcādriś ca | śa
ktiḥ prabhutvamantrotsāhalakṣaṇā praharaṇaviśeṣaś ca | mayūraketuḥ kumāraḥ || 48 ||

lg.l: tad adbhutaṃ yad vijayaiṣiṇāṃ śriyaṃ prasādhayanty apravimṛṣṭavigrahāḥ || 49 ||

div.p:
apravimṛ
ṣṭo 'spṛṣṭo vigrahaḥ kalaho yeṣu tādṛśā api guṇāḥ śriyaṃ prasādayanti prakarṣeṇotpādayanti |
vibhāvyamānātya......lakṣyamāṇā āsanādayas trayo guṇā yeṣu | pariṣkāramaṇayo vibhūṣa
ṇaratnāni | te tu vibhāvyamānā āsane padake saṃdheḥ saṃśleṣasya saṃśrayo yeṣāṃ tādṛśāḥ śa
rīram asaṃspṛśya yad bhūṣayanti tac citram_ | prasādhanaṃ maṇḍanam api | vigrahaḥ śarīram api || 49 ||

lg.l: kṛtāspadā sāraguruḥ sthirātmasu kṣameva dikkuñjaravigraheṣv asau |
jahāty upāyeṣu caturṣu na sthitiṃ dṛḍhīkṛtā nītir iha kṣamādharaiḥ || 50 ||

div.p:
sāra utkarṣo gauravaṃ ca | guruḥ pūjyā | kṣamā bhūḥ | kṣamādharāḥ sahiṣṇavaḥ parvatāś ca
|| 50 ||

lg.l: upeyasiddhyai bhavatāṃ matiḥ sthirā pravartate ced anupāyasādhanā |
avaimi ṣāḍguṇyavicāragocaraiḥ kṛtaṃ tataḥ saṃprati nītiśāsanaiḥ || 51 ||

div.p: śāsanaṃ śāstram_ || 51 ||

lg.l: vidhātum ekākina eva līlayā na mūrtibhedā iva kiṃ svayaṃbhuvaḥ || 52 ||

div.p:
mūrtibhedā hariprabhṛtayaḥ | svayaṃbhūḥ śivaḥ || 52
||

lg.l: na yuddhasaṃrambharasāt tathāpi tu kṣamāḥ parān mārṣṭum hāṃsabhittayaḥ || 53 ||
avaimi daityān samareṣu durjayān bhujāṃś ca vo diggajahastapīvarān |
ato 'tra yukto naya eva saṃkaṭe jalaplave setur ivottitīrṣatām || 54 ||
kim asty ataḥ śaṃsata vācyaviplutaṃ yad abhyupāyeṣu pareṣu satsv api |
dviṣatsu carcā bhavatām apīdṛśī pracaṇḍadaṇḍaikarasā vijṛmbhate || 55 ||
upāya eveti ca daṇḍa eṣa no na nītivṛddhair avalambanīkṛtaḥ |
tathāpi kārye 'tra guruṇy upekṣituṃ na yuktarūpo bhavatām anukramaḥ || 56 ||

div.p:
tair api daṇḍo 'yam upāya iti kṛtvā āśrita eva | vṛddhāś ca va
yojyeṣṭhāḥ | tair daṇḍo yaṣṭir avalambanaṃ kriyate | gatyupāyatvāt_ | no iti pratiṣedhe || 56 ||

lg.l: na kāryasindhor iha tārayanti kaṃ plavā ivoccaiḥ kṛtinaḥ sakarṇakāḥ || 57 ||

div.p:
niruddhena randhraprasareṇa codyavatareṇa(?) ślathībhavann asaṃpadyamāno jaḍapraveśo mūrkhāṇām avakāśa
s tena yaḥ sthiraḥ saṃdhyākhyo guṇas tena susthitāḥ sakarṇakāś ca bahuśrutāḥ kṛtinaḥ kārya
sindhoḥ kaṃ na tārayanti sarvam eva tatpāre prāpnuvanti | uḍupā iva | tatpakṣe randhraṃ chidram_ |
jalaṃ vāri | saṃdhiḥ saṃśleṣaḥ | sakarṇakāḥ sakhaṭakāḥ | sthitir maryādāvasthānaṃ ca || 57
||

lg.l: dahanti kalpapralayeṣu bhānavo jaganti velāṃ ślathayanti sāgarāḥ |
na tādṛśo 'sau samayo 'sti yatra vā sthitiṃ vibhindanti ruṣā bhavādṛśāḥ || 58 ||
avaimi nūnaṃ na ca bhartur ājñayā vinā samarthāḥ stha ripor vinigrahe |
jagatpariplāvayituṃ na vīcayaḥ kṣamās taṭasthasya kadācid ambudheḥ || 59 ||
pravartamānāṃ pratipattum arhatha tridhā vibhinnām ata eva śūlinaḥ |
hitāya śaktiṃ kṛtaviṣṭapatrayasthitiṃ purārer iva nākanimnagām || 60 ||
ayaṃ prabhuḥ karmasu daivamānuṣaprabhedarūpeṣv avilaṅghyatāṃ dadhat |
acintanīyo nayatattvacintakair manīṣibhir daivam iti sma kathyate || 61 ||

div.p:

raśmayaś ca | maṇḍalaṃ rāṣṭraṃ bimbaṃ ca | āhavīyaṃ yuddhajam_ | ravimaṇḍalaṃ rāhavīyaṃ rāhorā
gataṃ viplavaṃ na gacchatīti virodhaḥ || 5 ||

lg.l: nāpa bhūtimalanāt kadarthanāṃ tāpayogam agaman na ca kvacit |
yaḥ suvṛttavimalasthitir dadhau ratnadarpaṇa ivādhikāṃ śriyam || 6 ||

div.p:
bhūtimalanā saṃpado dhāraṇaṃ bhasmanodva(tpuṃ)
sanaṃ ca | tāpo duḥkhaṃ saṃtāpaś ca | sa hi darpaṇasyotpuṃsanāvasare dīyata iti prasiddham_ |
vṛttaṃ śīlaṃ vartulatvaṃ ca | śrīḥ samṛddhiḥ śobhā ca || 6 ||

lg.l: hārayaṣṭir iva kīrtir uccakair maṇḍanatvam agamat paraṃ diśām || 7 ||

div.p:
cāravo guṇāḥ śauryādaya eva mau
ktikotkaraḥ | cāravo guṇāś ca tantavo yasya mauktikotkarasya || 7 ||

lg.l: yasya ca prasṛtayā nirargalaṃ kaiṭabhadviṣa ivonnatiśritaḥ |

div.p:
prasṛtā nirgatā jaṅghā
ca | unnatir abhimāna ucchrāyaś ca | añjasā spaṣṭam_ || 8 ||

lg.l: laṅghitā bhuvanakānanodare yasya nemur akhilā harillatāḥ || 9 ||

div.p:
...... śāstreṇa takṣaṇaṃ
ca || 10 ||

lg.l: tasya tatra vadato vacas tadā nirgatā daśanaraśmimaṇḍalī |

div.p: 11 || daśabhiḥ kulakam_ ||
(daśabhiḥ kulakam_)

lg.l: ūrjitaṃ ca madhuraṃ ca śuśrūvān vaktum abhyadhikam utsaheta kaḥ || 12 ||

div.p:
saṃprahāro raṇam_ | tadāśrayaṇād ūrjitam_ | utsa
heta śaknuyāt_ || 12 ||

lg.l: droṇakāka iva niṣṭhuraṃ sadaḥkānane kim api raumyalajjitaḥ || 13 ||

div.p:
kovidair āracitā kṛtā kovidāraiś ca kāñcanāratarubhiś citā vyā
ptāḥ | atra etasmin_ | saṃnihito nīlakaṃdharo haro yatra | atrasantaś ca nirbhayā nihitā
dhṛtā nīlakaṃdharā barhiṇo yatra | droṇakāko vṛddhavāyasaḥ || 13 ||

lg.l: śuśruvān api gaṇādhipoditaṃ vākyam etad aham akṣamaṃ bruve |
śrotrarandhragatakekikūjitaḥ kiṃ virauti paruṣaṃ na maukuliḥ || 14 ||

div.p:
akṣamam ayogyam | mau
kuliḥ kākaḥ || 14 ||

lg.l: tat tathāpi jaḍatānurodhataḥ śatruto 'tha yudhi bibhyatā mayā |
nītivartmarabhasād utoditaṃ śrotum arhatha malīmasaṃ vacaḥ || 15 ||
na krudho 'vasara eṣa sāṃprataṃ gāḍham āndhyagatamo nṛṇām asau |
dṛśyatāṃ gaṇapate 'nyayā dṛśā kāryam etad atisaṃkaṭe sthitam || 16 ||

div.p:
asau krut_ tamohīnam andhatvam_ | anyayā dṛśā nītima
yena cakṣuṣā || 16 ||

lg.l: tīkṣṇatām avihatāṃ dadhānayā bhedapāṭavajuṣā yudhi dviṣām |

div.p:
bhedaḥ svāmitaḥ pṛthakkaraṇaṃ vidāraṇaṃ ca | kṛtyāḥ kruddho lubdho
bhīto 'vamānī ceti bhedyāḥ kṛtyāni ca kāryāṇi | pakṣaḥ samūhaḥ || 17 ||

lg.l: bibhrati sma virasatvam ānanaiḥ śoṣitauṣṭhapuṭatālavaḥ surāḥ || 18 ||

div.p:
yasyetyādi pa
ñcabhiḥ kulakam_ | virasatvaṃ mlānatā kaṭutā ca || 18 ||

lg.l: yaś cakāra parihīnam ojasā bhānubimbam iva siṃhikāsutaḥ || 19 ||

div.p:
pratāpaḥ prakṛṣṭas tāpo 'pi | chā
yāvahelāpi || 19 ||

lg.l: prāptam andham avamṛdya tāpitaṃ yaḥ karasthitim upāgataṃ kramāt |
ātmadarśam iva vidviṣāṃ vyadhān maṇḍalaṃ mukhavilokanakṣamam || 20 ||

div.p:
andhaṃ prāptam arthitām upagatam | ...andhaś ca kārye kāraṇopacārāt_
ślakṣṇatām aprāpto yena(?) | karo daṇḍo 'pi | mukhavilokanakṣamaṃ bhatyavan mukhaprekṣy api || 20 ||

lg.l: yaś ca śaṅkham iva kaiṭabhaṃ dviṣan saṃdadhau karatalāśrayaṃ yaśaḥ || 21 ||

div.p:
sādhuśabdaḥ sādhv iti kathanam_ śobhanaḥ śabdaḥ | kaiṭabhaṃ dviṣan kaiṭabhāriḥ | ‘dviṣaḥ śatur vā’
iti ṣaṣṭhīniṣedhaḥ | saṃdadhāv iti saṃdhānaṃ samyagdhāraṇam abhimukhīkāraś ca || 21 ||

lg.l: tādṛśe 'pi suravairiṇīdṛśaṃ spaṣṭam agrahaṇam eva bibhratām |
brūta kiṃ nu bhavatāṃ vibhāvyate dhairyam etad uta jāḍyajṛmbhitam || 22 ||

div.p:
agrahaṇam a
valepaḥ || 22 ||
(pañcabhiḥ kulakam_)

lg.l: sādhyavastuṣu na sāmapūrvakaṃ sādhanaṃ na khalu śasyate budhaiḥ |
bibhrato bhavati dhīrakopatām ānanaṃ prathamam unmiṣatsmitam || 23 ||

div.p: sādhanaṃ......danam_ | dhīraḥ sthiraḥ || 23 ||

lg.l: viddhi bhedagahanair avasthitaṃ tac ca saṃkalitapañcabhaktikam || 24 ||

div.p:
viplavasyānyathābhāvasyodayada
śā utthānāvasthā ta......ryam upajanayat tac ca sāmaivaṃ viddhi | kīdṛśam_ | bhedagahanair bahutvād durava
gamair bhedair avasthitam api saṃkalitāḥ saṃkṣepeṇa nirūpitāḥ guṇasaṃkīrtanam_, saṃbandhopākhyānam_,
parasparopakāradarśanam_, āyatipradarśanam_, ātmopavartanam_, ityevaṃrūpāḥ pañca bhaktayo bhāgā
yasya tādṛśam_ | atha ca sāmavedo 'py evaṃvidha eva | tasya bhedāḥ sahasraṃ śākhāḥ| bhakta
yo hiṃkārādyāḥ | uktaṃ hi—‘āvahalakṣma hiṃkāraḥ prastāvaḥ pratihārakaḥ | udgītho ni
dhanaś ceti pañcoktāḥ sāmabhaktayaḥ ||’ iti || 24 ||

lg.l: dṛśyate purata eva mantriṇāṃ vādinām iva viparyaye jayaḥ || 25 ||

div.p:
kṛtyapakṣaṃ kāryakadambakaṃ prakāśayatāṃ
mantriṇāṃ sādhanasya kārya niṣpādakasya mantrasyāṅgāni karmaṇām ārambhopāya ityādīni |
bauddhādīnāṃ vādinām iva | te 'pi kṛtyapakṣaṃ svakalpitaṃ pratijñāṃ prakaṭayantaḥ sādhanasya hetoḥ
pakṣadharmatādīnām aṅgānāṃ vacanasyāpi(?) || 25 ||

lg.l: vidviṣāṃ haratu mantra eṣa vaḥ kṣveḍam āpyam iva darpavibhramam || 26 ||

div.p:
‘kṣveḍaṃ viṣaṃ tad āpyaṃ ca rūḍhyā vāruṇa
m ucyate | prasvedalālāpulakagalabandhapravartakam_’ || 26 ||

avayavāḥ karmaṇām ārambho
pāya ityādayaḥ | pratijñāhetudṛṣṭāntopanayananigamanāni ca | kaṇavratavineyāḥ kaṇādaśi
ṣyāḥ | vipakṣāḥ prativādino 'pi || 27 ||

lg.l: sādhayadbhir avirugṇam īpsitaṃ śāstrahetubhir iva trilakṣmabhiḥ |
jṛmbhitaṃ jagati yair anargalaṃ vairibhiḥ pratidiśaṃ divaukasām || 28 ||

div.p:
avirugṇam apratihatam_ | īpsitaṃ svamatam api |
śāstrahetavaḥ svabhāvakāryānupalabdhyākhyāḥ | trilakṣmabhiḥ kulyakṛtrimabhūmyanantaratvena,
pakṣadharmatānvayavyatirekayogena ca trirūpaiḥ || 28 ||

lg.l: bhoginām iva na daṇḍaghaṭṭanā nopaghātaghaṭanāya vidviṣām || 29 ||

div.p:
daṇḍaś caturtha upāyo yaṣṭiś ca | yugmam_
|| 29 ||
(yugalakam_)

lg.l: andhakāra iva śītarociṣā dhūmarāśir akṛśaḥ purā pape || 30 ||

div.p: pape pītaḥ || 30 ||

lg.l: so 'mṛtapratinidhitvam īyivāṃś cintya eva bhṛgunandano 'pi vaḥ || 31 ||

div.p: bhṛgunandanaḥ śukraḥ || 31 ||
(yugalakam_)

lg.l: brūta dīpakaśikheva kiṃ nu vo lakṣyate rabhasaghūrṇanākulā || 32 ||

div.p:
ghūrṇanam anavasthi
tiḥ || 32 ||

lg.l: saṃkaṭeṣv adhikam eva dhīmatāṃ visphuranti nanu mantraśaktayaḥ |

div.p: nanv iti tathāpītyarthaḥ || 33 ||

lg.l: yūyam āhavarase vyavasthitāḥ saprabhāvam api vīryam atra vaḥ |
cintyatāṃ nanu vipāka īdṛśe kṛtyavastuni yato bhaved guṇaḥ || 34 ||

div.p:
vipākaḥ pariṇāmaḥ | yato
vipākāt_ | vaidyake ca dravyāṇāṃ rasaprabhāvavīryanirūpaṇāmadhye vipāko 'pi cintitaḥ |
sa ca guṇam ārogyaṃ karoti || 34 ||

lg.l: maṇḍalaṃ jagadi vartubhiḥ sphuṭaṃ ṣaḍbhir eva parivartyate guṇaiḥ || 35 ||

div.p: phalam arthaprāptir api || 35 ||

lg.l: mūḍhamārgarabhasāhṛtāḥ sphuṭaṃ na śriyo 'pi bahu manvate patīn || 36 ||

div.p:
cañcala
tvavirasā cāvisaṃvadantī avyabhicarantī ata eva svāśayasya svādhārasya jaladher anuguṇā
sadṛśī vṛttir yāsāṃ tadbhāvaṃ prāptāḥ | mūḍhamārgeṇa jaḍopasevitena rabhasenānītāḥ śriyo naiva
patīn ādriyante || 36 ||

lg.l: nītivartma viṣamīkaroti vaḥ kṣuṇṇam etad abhito mahājanaiḥ || 37 ||

div.p:
kṣuṇṇaṃ sevitam_ | rathaś ca kṣuṇṇam api mārgaṃ viṣamīkaroti viśṛṅkha
layati || 37 ||

lg.l: hlādahetur adhikaṃ raṇeṣu vo yadyapi kvacana bhīmadarśanaiḥ |

div.p:
hlādahetur ityādi trayodaśabhiḥ kulakam_ | atra ca tātparyam_—yadyapi
yūyaṃ bahuśaḥ samare samāsāditāśayāḥ, samanantareṇa ca kīrtiprāptiḥ, samaranihataiś ca
śatrubhir udbhavo bhavati rājalakṣmīlakṣāṇām_, tathāpi tat kathayata prāptajayaśriyo 'py adhibhuvaḥ
prabhoḥ svasaṃbandhino bhujavīryaśālinaś cārabhāṭā yadi na dūṣitāḥ kasmād ebhir akasmād bandhu
kṣayaḥ kārita ity apavādapadavīṃ prāpitānīty ābādhaḥ | na tu svajanakṣayo 'pi na vācya
tāhetur iti || 38 ||

kātarasya durlabhā kīrtir iti saṃbandhamātre ṣaṣṭhī | hāriṇī hṛdyā
sahārā ca || 39 ||

lg.l: saṃyugārtham iva yadyapīha vaś codayanti karavālayaṣṭayaḥ || 40 ||

div.p: mañjulaṃ madhuram_ || 40 ||
paṭavāsaś candanādikṛtaṃ cūrṇam_ || 41 ||
pakṣāṇāṃ dhavanaiḥ kampanaiḥ || 42 ||

pretā mṛtāḥ | ānakā dundubhayaś ca paṭahāḥ
|| 44 ||
pheravāḥ śivāḥ || 45 ||
mohanaṃ suratam_ || 47 ||

saṃsthitāplavanaṃ
mṛtasnānam_ || 48 ||
dīrghanidrā mūrccha | bodhavibhramaḥ svāpaḥ || 49 ||

lg.l: āsthitasya tarasā jayaśriyaṃ brūta yady adhibhuvo na dūṣitāḥ || 50 ||

div.p: (trayodaśabhiḥ kulakam_)

lg.l: āyudhāni vividhāni santi vaḥ pīvarā bhaṭajanasya bāhavaḥ |

div.p: guṇāḥ saṃdhyādyāḥ | strī ca capalā guṇena śṛṅkhalayā badhyate || 52 ||

sāṃkhyaḥ saṅgrāmabhavo
yogo yuktiḥ | jñātaṃ sattvapradhānānāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ parasparaṃ niḥsattvebhyo vāntaraṃ viśeṣo
yena | vikārā bhṛkuṭyādaya evopaplavaḥ | tad utpannena duḥkhalavena ghaṭanā saṃbandhaḥ | viveka
bhāg utpannavicāraḥ | yaś ca vivekabhāg yogī sāṃkhyayogayoḥ kāpilapātañjalaśāstrayor niścita
matiḥ sa prakṛtipuruṣayor vivekajñānād vikārebhyo mahadahaṃkārādibhyo viplavaḥ samutthānaṃ yeṣāṃ
teṣām avidyāsmitādīnāṃ kleśānāṃ leśenāpi na yujyate || 53 ||

lg.l: muhyate ya iha kṛtyavastuni jyotirakṣatanayātmakaṃ dadhat |

div.p:
muhyata ity ātmanepadam antarbhā
vitaṇyarthatayā karmaṇi | parair mohyata ityarthaḥ || 54 ||

lg.l: vidviṣaty atulitoruvikrame vikrameta sahasā na nītimān |
ko nu saṃśayitapannage karaṃ vāmalūravivare vinikṣipet || 55 ||

div.p:
sahasā na vikrameta nirvicāraṃ na
yāyāt_ | ‘veḥ pādaviharaṇe’ iti taṅ_ | vāmalūro valmīkaḥ || 55 ||

lg.l: śrautam āgamam ivātivartituṃ kaḥ kṣameta nayaśāstrasaṃgraham || 56 ||

div.p:
mantrasya paścātma
kasya yuktir yojanam_ | pramāṇatāṃ dadhat_ prāmāṇikaḥ | sāmabhedau prathamatṛtīyāv upāyau |
śrautaṃ vaidikam_ | vedāgamo 'pi ‘śataṃ jīva śaradaḥ’ ityādibhir mantrair yuktibhiś ca tat prāmāṇyo
payoginībhir upapattibhir gahanaḥ | sāmno vedasya bhedāḥ śākhāḥ || 56 ||

lg.l: mā smaitat surasuravairiṇāṃ virodhe trailokyaṃ sakalam akāṇḍabhaṅguraṃ bhūt || 57 ||

div.p:
kadalī
dalorūr aṅganā | ‘ūrūttarapadād aupamye’ ity ūṅ_ || 58 ||
dohado 'bhilāṣaḥ || 59 ||

uḍupa
tho 'ntarikṣam_ | caḍulya ulkāḥ | mā kṣubhann iti ‘dyudbhyo luṅi’ iti parasmaipadam_ |
dyutādipāṭhād aṅ_ || 60 ||

iti śrībālabṛhaspatyanujīvino vāgīśvarāṅkasya vidyadhipatyaparanāmno mahākave
rājānakaśrīratnākarasya kṛtau ratnāṅke haravijaye mahākāvye puṣpahāsa
nayopanyāso nāma caturdaśaḥ sargaḥ |

iti rājānakajayānakasūnor alakasya kṛtau haravijayaviṣama
padoddyote caturdaśaḥ sargaḥ ||
pañcadaśaḥ sargaḥ |

lg.l: iti saṃhṛtasaṃyugābhiyoge sadasi vyomni payomucīva tasmin |

div.p:
nandiṣeṇākhyo gaṇapatiḥ sarasvatīṃ sasarjeti paścadaśabhiḥ kulakam_ | sādhuvāda eva
kekā tayā kalakolāhalo haraparivāro yatra tasmin sadasi niṣiddhayuddhodyoge tasmin puṣpa
hāse viṣaye garjati maurkhyam ālambite sati | yathā kekāmukharamayūravṛnde nabhasi meghe 'pi
saṃhṛtaḥ saṃghaṭitaḥ samyagyugasya mithunasya || 1 ||

śūnyābhidhā dṛṣṭir yasya | aparasya
taṭaughasya nimnam unnatapṛṣṭhaṃ bhugnaṃ ca vakṣa ābhugnakākhyaṃ yatra tat kṛtvā | ayaṃ ca bharato
ddeśaḥ—‘kiṃcit pārśvānatagrīvaṃ śiro vijñeyam añcitam_ | samatārā samapuṭā niṣkampā śūnya
darśanā || bāhyārthāgrāhiṇī...syā śūnyā dṛṣṭiḥ prakīrtitā | nimnam unnatapṛṣṭhaṃ ca vyābhugnaṃ
saṃślathaṃ tathā || ābhugnaṃ taduro jñeyam_’ || 3 ||

lg.l: mukulīkṛtadṛṣṭi phullagaṇḍaṃ parivāhyāśu śiro mukhaṃ dadhāne |

div.p:
‘sphuradāśliṣṭapakṣmāgrā mukulordhvapuṭāś citā |
sukhāmīlitatārā ca mukulā dṛṣṭir ucyate || paryāyataḥ pārśvagataṃ śiraḥ syāt parivāhitam_’
iti | ripulakṣmyāḥ kṣayārthaṃ kaṇḍūbharo 'bhilāṣavṛddhir yatra sa ḍimbaḍambaro bāhuyuddhaprapa
ñcas tat sthe dhanapatau sati | ḍimbaṃ tumulayuddham iti kecit_ || 4 ||

lg.l: caraṇāmburuhaṃ vipakṣalokaḥ smarati sma vyasanāturaḥ puraṃdhryāḥ || 5 ||

div.p:
avidyamānāvamam atya
ntaśreṣṭham_ | jīrakasyājājer maṇḍalībhiḥ sanātham_ | caraṇāmburuham api navo mañjīrako nūpura
eva maṇḍalī tat sanātham_ || 5 ||

lg.l: gamanād iva mantharatvam uccaiḥ paripāṇḍutvam ivācchagaṇḍabhāgāt |
kṛśatā bhṛśam ādade ca madhyād iva yasyārinitambinīvapurbhiḥ || 6 ||

div.p: mantharatvam ālasyam_ || 6 ||

lg.l: ripucakramanūṣmatāṃ dadhānaṃ sapadi prākṛtam eva yasya jajñe || 7 ||

div.p:
hārī varṇaḥ śarīrakānti
r yasya | parivṛttir dhūsaratā | svarasyāpi dainyayogaḥ | saṃdhir maittrī | ūṣmā darpaḥ | sapadi
param anantaram eva | prākṛtaṃ vikṛṣṭam_ | atha ca ripucakram eva prākṛtaṃ prākṛtabhāṣām ayaṃ ca
kāvyam iti ca rūpakam_ | tatra ca varṇānāṃ halāṃ svarāṇāṃ cākārādīnāmacāṃ viparyayaḥ
kriyate | kvacit saṃdhikāryābhāvaś ca | ūṣmāṇau ṣaśau na prayujyete | uktaṃ hi—‘ṛṝḷḹ
na santy atra ṅaṇanā api no pṛthak_ | na śaṣau na dvivacanaṃ caturthī dṛśyate kvacit_ ||’
iti || 7 ||

lg.l: yudhi yena vivalgatā salīlaṃ karikumbhā galadacchamauktikaughāḥ |

div.p:
pakṣāḥ sahāyāḥ | apakṣatitvaṃ nirbādhatā | yaḥ parigṛhītapatattraḥ sa
katham apakṣatir apakṣamūlaḥ syād iti tu virodhaḥ | apikṣata piṣṭāḥ | karmaṇi luṅ_ || 9 ||

tigmatejasas tīvrapratāpā ye ripavas tan nāśe jhag iti vyāpādakatvāt prakṛṣṭadoṣaḥ khaḍgo yasya |
pratipakṣabhūtasya ca tigmāṃśoḥ pradoṣo rātrimukhamastamayahetuḥ || 10 ||

lg.l: śriyam eti ca yasya khaḍgayaṣṭir vipulā pāṇḍuradantamaṇḍalāṅkā |

div.p:
ālito
baddhaḥ | madāro marakatam_ | saṃniveśaṃ veśma || 12 ||

lg.l: pramathādhipater nirākariṣyan giram aurjityavatīṃ vivṛtya kiṃcit || 14 ||

div.p: vitarka ūhaḥ || 14 ||

spaṣṭena dantāṃśuvyājena darśitā tīrasthakāśānām iva śobhā yasyāḥ | kalaṅko 'paśabdā
dir malaś ca | sarasvatī nadībhedo 'pi | sāpi tīrakāśaiḥ saśobhā || 15 ||
(pañcadaśabhiḥ kulakam_)

mānasaṃ saro
'pi || 16 ||

lg.l: harasaṃsadi tasya cābhidhitsor giram uccair anabhiplutārthagurvīm |

div.p:
anabhipluto gabhīraḥ | samavastrayan paridadhuḥ | ‘vastrāt samācchādane’| iti
ṇic_ || 17 ||

lg.l: anapekṣya bhavādṛśāṃ puro yal laghuvāgmitvam abhivyanakti mādṛk |
aparādhyati tatra nūnam eṣā tad anāryā khalu kāryanimnataiva || 18 ||

div.p: anapekṣyāvicārya | nimnatā gāmbhīryam_ || 18 ||

lg.l: pratipādayituṃ yad anyathārthān kuśalatvena jano vyavasyatīmān |
sakalaḥ sa guṇo 'sya vāgmitāyāḥ satataṃ te punar ātmarūpaniṣṭhāḥ || 19 ||

pinaṣāma cūrṇayāma | cūrṇasyeva pinaṣāma cūrṇapeṣam_ | ‘upamāne karmaṇi
ca’ iti ṇamul_ | surāhitānām iti ‘jāsiniprahaṇa—’ iti ṣaṣṭhī || 34 ||

nāśa eva hetuḥ |

div.p:
pinehivāṃso baddhavantaḥ |
‘vaṣṭi bhāgurirallopam avāpyor upasargayoḥ’ ity akāralopaḥ | ghanāghano navo meghaḥ | ghāṭiḥ
sāmyam_ || 39 ||
pariṣiṣvaṅkṣurāliṅgitum icchuḥ || 40 ||

div.p:
prabhutā vyāpakatvam api | mali
nātmakena sapāpenāpi | bhāsvān ravir api | saṃdhiḥ saṃśleṣo 'pi || 41 ||

lg.l: bhajate hi na sādhyatāṃ sa sāmnā sakaloccheditayāptavān prabhutvam |
niyataṃ vibudheṣu baddhavairā api tanmaṇḍalavartino na bhedyāḥ || 42 ||
na tad asti jagattraye 'pi ratnaṃ na kṛtaṃ tena yad ātmasāt kilādau |
bhavatāṃ tadupapradānasādhyāṃ sthitim īyād iti vārtam eva manye || 43 ||

div.p:
vṛti
saṃvṛtiḥ, tatra bhavaṃ vārtamatattvam_ | asāram iti yāvat_ || 43 ||

lg.l: iti daṇḍa ihāvaśiṣyamāṇe sakalāḥ santu varūthinīcarā naḥ |

div.p:
kuṭṭanaṃ cūrṇanam_ | strīme
lakaś ca kuṭṭanaḥ | tatsādṛśyaṃ sāmyam asurahṛtābhir apsarobhiḥ saha punaḥ samāgamajananāt_
|| 44 ||

lg.l: athavā kim amībhir indumaulir bhrukuṭībhinnalalāṭabhittir āstām |
kṣaṇam ekam api vrajantu cāripramadānāṃ smaraṇīyatāṃ vilāsāḥ || 45 ||

div.p: (tilakam_)

vibhāvasur agniḥ | tasyāvipannasya sphītasyo
citatvaṃ bibhrat_ | uddīpito jvalitaḥ kāmo yena | ataś ca bahubhiḥ saṃbhogaprathamābhilā
ṣavipralambhādibhir bhedaiḥ prasiddhasya śṛṅgārākhyasya rasasya yaḥ prabandho nāṭakādau niveśanaṃ
tatsadṛśam_ | badhyamāno 'pi śṛṅgāraḥ saṃnihitair vibhāvair ālambanoddīpanarūpaiḥ kāraṇaiḥ sūci
tatvaṃ prakaṭatāṃ dhatte | yad uktam_—‘vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyogād rasaniṣpattiḥ’ iti |
uddīpitaś ca samedhitaḥ kāmo yena || 49 ||

lg.l: samapatsyata nedṛśo nikāras tad ayaṃ nākasadāṃ sadaiva tebhyaḥ || 50 ||
bahunā kim udīritena nātha tvadupekṣāvasareṇa daityalokaḥ |

div.p:
sa śakro 'ndhakabhayād bhūyo
'pi padmanālavālasthitiṃ prāpyātikārśyāt savikāsāspadatāṃ puraiti āgamiṣyatīti saṃba
ndhaḥ | sūkṣmam api bisasūtraṃ tasya vistīrṇam āspadaṃ bhaviṣyatītyarthaḥ | etīti ‘yāvat pu
rānipātayor laṭ_’ | ahito 'ndhakaḥ | marutvān indraḥ | namucir nāma daityaḥ sa sarvaśastrāṇām a
mavadhyo 'smīty āsāditavaro marutvatā tan nihitakuliśaśaktinā phenena hataḥ || 52 ||

lg.l: kuliśāgniśikhāhatā ivaite na yayur vibhramapallavāḥ praroham || 53 ||
gamitaṃ sapadi cchidāṃ mayeti svarucetīva jahāsa yasya phenaḥ || 54 ||
punar apy aravindanālasūtrasthitim āsādya sa dānavendrabhīteḥ |
kraśimātiśayena śokadīnaḥ sa vikāsaspadatāṃ puraiti śakraḥ || 55 ||

lg.l: śikhini pralayaṃ krameṇa nīte dviṣatāyodhanamūrdhni tad vadhūnām |

div.p:

|| 56 ||

iti taṅ_ || 60 ||

śātpratipattimūḍhā kiṃkartavyatāśūnyā kiṃcid api nāceṣṭata tūṣṇīm evābhūt_ | kevalam asraṃ

ṇam_—‘praspandamānapakṣmāgrā nātyarthaṃ mukulaiḥ puṭaiḥ | malināntā ca malinā dṛṣṭiḥ pi

nirgatāḥ śreṇayo mahākulaprasūtā yasyāḥ | niḥśreṇiś cādhirohiṇī || 54 ||

akṣmāyi
vidhūnitam_ | ‘kṣmāyī vidhūnane’ | ājaghnuṣībhir ākrāntavatībhiḥ || 55 ||

talaḥ prasārito
hastaḥ || 56 ||
viḍambito 'bhibhūto 'nukṛto vā | prajaṅghaṃ prakṛṣṭajaṅgham api || 57 ||
(kalāpakam_)
yasyetyādi pañcabhiḥ kulakam_ || 58 ||
baṃhimā bāhulyam_ || 59 ||

āpītais taraṅgai
s tāmrāḥ | cīnapiṣṭaṃ sindūram_ || 60 ||

pratāpaḥ śauryaprabhāva ātapaś ca | tigma
bhāsi śatrau ravau ca | paryastaḥ patito lambamānaś ca | maṇḍalāgraḥ kṛpāṇo maṇḍalasya
cāgraṃ prāntaḥ | chāyā kāntir ātapābhāvaś ca | drumo daityabhedas taruś ca || 62 ||
(pañcabhiḥ kulakam_)

lg.l: m āsphālayeṣv asanam āśu vimuñca bāṇān |

div.p:
vyuham i
tyādi pañcabhiḥ kulakam_ | samāracaya kṛtavantam_ | pūrvaval loṭ_ || 63 ||

vivaśīkṛto
'dhiṣṭhitaḥ | vigrahaḥ śarīram api | daityārir viṣṇuḥ | tena māyākṛtastrīrūpeṇāmṛtaṃ jahra iti
prasiddham_ || 64 ||

yasyāriveśmasv ardhasaṃpannāś citrapuruṣā dṛṣṭyunmīlanābhāvād asthirāṃ la
kṣmīm ivācintayan_ || 65 ||
ekāṅgulīniveśaḥ kapole cintāvaśāt_ || 66 ||

dhūma
ketur nāma daityo durnimittasūcakaṃ ca jyotiḥ | dṛḍho 'nucchedyaḥ | mūlaṃ rāṣṭram_ | kīrtir eva
patākā | yaś ca ketur dhvajaḥ sa dṛḍhabandho vaijayantīruddhagaganavartmā samunnatadaṇḍaś ca bhavati
|| 67 ||
(pañcabhiḥ kulakam_)

lakṣmītyādi daśabhiḥ kulakam_ | paryucchvasantas tyaktadāridryabhāratayā duḥkham
utsṛjanto budhā yasyām_ | phalabandhaḥ pātreṣu pratipādanādaraḥ | viśrāṇanaṃ dānam_ | tadarthaṃ
yad amalaṃ jalaṃ tad evāsidhārā tatpātena cchinnamūlā | latāpy ullasatkusumā saphalā ca kena
cid vimalajalāsidhārāpātacchinnamūlā kriyate || 68 ||
udanaṃsīd unnanāma || 69 ||

vi
ṣyaṇṇaḥ srutaḥ | ṭaṅkaḥ sundaraṃ rūpam_ | tadracanāvasare pariṣekārthaṃ lagno yaḥ paṅkaḥ pānākhyaṃ
mārjanadravyaṃ taccarcācihnitam iva | athavā ṭaṅkenāyastāḍanena ghaṭṭane kriyamāṇe pariṣekapaṅkasya
lohaparamāṇūnāṃ parasparapreya(?)viniveśitasya kardamasya carcayāṅkitam ivetyarthaḥ || 70 ||
viśvākṛter viśvarūpasya sataḥ | arkaśaśinor maṇḍale eva bījakośau karṇike || 71 ||

helayā mathitau raktakardamamadhye 'tilagnau madhukaiṭabhāveva ṭiṭṭibhau matkuṇau yasyāṃ sā vivṛ
ttilīlāyāḥ śobhābhūt_ || 73 ||
śikhaṇḍaś cūlā || 74 ||

keśināmā aśvarūpo daityaḥ |
avaṭasīmni kuharamārge || 75 ||

sphuṭaṃ kolasya varāhasya siṃhasya rūpaṃ yasyām_ | anyatra
sphuṭāḥ sūkarāḥ siṃhā rūpāś ca mṛgā yasyām_ | vyavasthā vividhā daśā || 76 ||

lg.l: kiṃ kīrtitair bahubhir atra kṛtātmabhis tai-
r anyaiś ca sāram idam eva nanu bruve vaḥ |

div.p:
hṛdayaṃ
paramārthaḥ || 77 ||
(daśabhiḥ kulakam)

lg.l: m āhlādayaty adhikam eva nayād avāptā || 78 ||

div.p:
nayād avāptā nītilabdhā daityānāṃ śrīś cetohāriṇī | na tu yādavena
hariṇā prāptā | sā hi tasyaiva prītyai bhavati nānyeṣām iti vyatireko 'tra tantreṇa bhaṇitaḥ
|| 78 ||

lg.l: tat tasya kaścid upayātu samīpam āśu
bodhe yataḥ praṇidhir eva ripos tam āhuḥ || 79 ||

div.p:
bhinnasya bhedam upagatasya itarasya cābhinnasya prakṛtivargasya kāryajñāne dūtam eva
praṇidhiṃ cāram āhuḥ | bhinnetarāḥ prakṛtayo yasya tathāvidhaṃ maṇḍalaṃ vā rāṣṭram || 79 ||

lg.l: m āryāḥ sa no 'surapatiḥ pratipatsyate cet |

div.p: uditaḥ kathitaḥ || 80 ||

lg.l: n na mama ditisutebhyaḥ kācid asty atra bhītiḥ |
kim aparam iti tarkātītamārgaṃ na vidmaḥ || 81 ||

div.p:
kim aparam_ | nirūpite 'pi naye nyāya kasmāt punar eṣa bhagavā
n kāryeṣu dolādhirūḍhas tiṣṭhatīty etad avitarkyatattvaṃ na jānīmaḥ || 81 ||

lg.l: vākyaṃ nītipathānusāri rabhasād uktvā vyaraṃsīd asau |
śaṃsan sādhv iti tac ca kālamusalaṃ dūtye niyojya dviṣaḥ

div.p:
dūtyaṃ dūtatā | ‘dū
tavaṇigbhyāṃ ca’ iti yaḥ || 82 ||

iti śrībālabṛhaspatyanujīvino vāgīśvarāṅkasya vidyādhipatyaparanāmno mahākave
rājānakaśrīratnākarasya kṛtau ratnāṅke haravijaye mahākāvye
dūtasaṃpreṣaṇanirūpaṇo nāma ṣoḍaśaḥ sargaḥ |

iti rājānakajayānakasūnor alakasya kṛtau haravija
yaviṣamapadoddyote ṣoḍaśaḥ sargaḥ ||
saptadaśaḥ sargaḥ |

lg.l: uttasthuṣy atha divasārdhaśaṅkhaśabde rāmābhis tadanucarāḥ savibhramābhiḥ |
uccetuṃ tarukusumāni mandarādrer nirjagmur muditadhiyaḥ kṛtānuyātrāḥ || 1 ||

div.p: tasyānucarā gaṇāḥ | rāmābhiḥ kṛtānuyātrā aṅganābhir anugatāḥ || 1 ||

tam ityādi
pañcabhiḥ kulakam_ | pavanābhighātasākṣiṇaḥ sthairyāt parivṛttimātrayogino gaṇḍaśailā yatra || 2 ||

udagāho jalāvagāhanam_ | ‘manthaudana—’ ityādinodabhāvaḥ | camūrā mṛgaviśeṣāḥ | pha
litaḥ pratibimbitaḥ | saprati...rkaḥ || 3 ||

kalpalatā eva saṃtatās taḍitas tadvilāsasya
megham_ | saṃbhuktāḥ kṛtasuratāḥ | gatyarthādisūtreṇa ktaḥ kartari cakārāt_ || 4 ||
kādambyaḥ kalahaṃsyaḥ || 6 ||
(pañcabhiḥ kulakam_)

lg.l: tac citraṃ sugatatayā yad anvitānāṃ pādānām aviralarāgatāvirāsīt || 7 ||

div.p:
śyāmāḥ striyaḥ | sugatatā sadgāmitvaṃ buddhatā ca | rāgo
lauhityam abhiṣvaṅgaś ca || 7 ||

lg.l: bibhrāṇā vipulakabandhatāṃ jayantyo niḥśeṣaṃ bhuvanam udīrṇakambunādāḥ |

div.p:
vicitraḥ pulakasya romodgamasya bandho yasyety anyapadārtha
mātre bahuvrīhiḥ | vipulāś ca kabandhāś chinnaśiraso narā yatra tadbhāvaṃ dadhatyaḥ | kambavo
valayāḥ śaṅkhāś ca | karavālikāh pāṇiṣv aṅgulīyakāḥ churikāś ca | ruciratarair aṅgadaiḥ keyūraiḥ,
ruciratarāṃ ca gadānām āyudhabhedānām upaśobhāṃ tanvānāḥ || 8 ||

lg.l: bhūyasyovanam anu nāyakānuyātās tāḥ senā iva kusumāyudhasya celuḥ || 9 ||

div.p:
aṅgāni gātrāṇi hastyā
dayaś ca | asamaḥ prakarṣayukto ratānto yasya tadbhāvena hṛdyām_ | na samare tāntaḥ khinnas ta
dbhāvena ramyāṃ ca | sirāḥ snāyavas tatkṛta upaghātaḥ sarvato vyādhis tadbhājām_, na | a
sayaḥ khaḍgā ropāḥ śarās tatprahārabhājāṃ ca | vanaṃ kānanam_, avanaṃ ca rakṣaṇam anu lakṣyī
kṛtya | nāyakāḥ kāminaḥ senādhipatayaś ca || 9 ||
(yugalakam_)

lg.l: tām udvīkṣitum iva tais tathā tathāptair vistāraṃ kṣitir avatastare nitambaiḥ || 11 ||

div.p:
yathāyathā kucakalaśair etā
nitambaṃ mā drākṣur iti mukhaśobhām ācchādayattuṅgatvamūḍhaṃ tathātathā tām evāvalokayitum iva
vistāraṃ gatair jaghanair bhūbhir avatastare 'vacchāditā || 11 ||

lg.l: visraste tridaśapuraṃdhrir uttarīye paśyantī dayitanakhakṣataṃ stanāgre |
caskhālānavahitacittavṛtti yāntī premāho kvacid api nekṣate vyapāyam || 12 ||

div.p: vyapāyo doṣaḥ || 12 ||

lg.l: autsukyāt kila jaghanālasāḥ priyāṇāṃ kaṇṭhāntaḥpraṇihitadorlataṃ yayus tāḥ 13

div.p:
kile
ty alīke | jaghanālasyavyājenetyarthaḥ | praṇihitā nikṣiptā || 13 ||

lg.l: nyasyantī sapadi padāni tatpadeṣu svedāmbhaḥkaṇakakarālitāni paścāt |
kasyāścil lalitagatāgataiḥ prayāntyāḥ saṃsaktaṃ bhujalatayā vighaṭyamānaḥ |

div.p:
saṃsaktam aja
sram_ || 15 ||

lg.l: mā smaiṣāṃ pathi paruṣe kadarthanā bhūt pādānām iti dayayeva komalānām |
klāmyantyāḥ pratipatham āśu vījitāyāḥ sakhyārān navaśikhipicchanālagauraḥ |

div.p: uttaṃsaḥ karṇapūro 'tra || 17 ||

lg.l: gacchantyāḥ pathi vicakāsa vaktraśobhā nīvī ca ślathitanitambabimbavāsāḥ 18
sarpantyāḥ kisalayapāṇinā muhūrtaṃ śliṣyantī tarugahane 'bhiveṣṭya dūrāt |
śyāmāyās tanum abhimīta madhyabhāgaṃ kasyāścit prakaṭakutūhaleva vallī || 19 ||

div.p:
nadītaṭānāṃ sāmyaṃ
kaṭībhiḥ pratyapādayat_ || 20 ||

lg.l: saṃsthānaṃ tanutaranālapattram agre nārībhiḥ pratipatham aikṣyataurubūkam || 21 ||

div.p:
uttānasthityā bhīṣaṇaḥ śyāmajaṅgho vikasitāṅguliś ca yaḥ
khagas tasya sāmarthyākālajaṅghākhyasya pakṣiṇaḥ pādas tat sadṛśam_ | tanutare nālapattre yasya |
pattrasya prasṛtāṅguliś caraṇa upamānam_ | tasya tadākāratvāt_ | vṛntasya tu jaṅghā | aurubū
kam eraṇḍasaṃbandhi || 21 ||

lg.l: sadvartmasthitim api pakṣmapaṅktim ūhur yaj jihmāṃ tad avamatām iva prapede || 22 ||

div.p:
sadvartmani nayanapuṭe tiṣṭhantīm api jihmāṃ pakṣmapaṅktiṃ yad ūhus ta
d asau nikṛṣṭatām ivāpa | sanmārgavartī hi pāpācaraṇe pṛthagjanebhyo 'py adhamaḥ | jihmā pāpā
kuṭilā ca | adha(va)mo nikṛṣṭo 'nṛjuś ca || 22 ||

lg.l: aurvaryaḥ sphuradaghanāvalambibimbā bimboṣṭhyo vibabhur apūrvavidyutas tāḥ || 23 ||

div.p:
urvarā bhūs tatra bhavā aurvaryaḥ | sphu
raddyotamānam_, aghanaṃ tanu, avalambi ca saralaṃ bimbaṃ śarīrābhogo yāsām_ | apūrvaṃ vi
śeṣeṇa dyotante | atha cāpūrvā vidyutas taḍito hlādahetavaḥ śītasparśāḥ sthiraprakāśā bhuvi
sthitā megheṣu cānavalambamānā bhavanti || 23 ||

yuvatīnāṃ samūho yauvatam_ | tena puṣpe
ṣv ekāgratāyogaṃ sphuṭam avatā gacchatā gāndharvasyeva sthitir vihitā | nūpurakvaṇitayogena pa
ryāptaśabdāni padāni yasya tadbhāvenollasatkāntinā | gāndharvaṃ ca ceto(?)manoharam_ |
puṣpeṣau ca kāme sphuṭam_ | uddīpakatvāt_ | avadhānaprayojyaṃ ca | tathā paryāptaiḥ svaraiḥ
ṣaḍjādibhiḥ, padaiḥ suptiṅṅ antaiḥ ṣaḍjādisvarādhārabhūtaiḥ, tālena ca kālamānarūpeṇa cañcu
puṭacācapuṭādinā sacchobhanam_ | uktaṃ ca—‘padasthaḥ svarasaṃghātas tālena sumitas tathā |
prayojyaś cāvadhānena gāndharvam abhidhīyate ||’ iti || 24 ||

alakā lalāṭāvalambinaḥ
keśāḥ | alakā ca dhanadapurī | puṣpakāñcī kusumamayī raśanā tayā śobhāvān_ | pu
ṣpakeṇa vimānenāñcati vrajatīti puṣpakāñcī kāntimāṃś ca || 25 ||

lg.l: madhyeṣu kraśimadaśāṃ śaśaṃsa loko bhāveṣu sthitir ucitā janasya śasyā || 26
prāptānām abalatayāpi niḥsahatvaṃ bhraṣṭānāṃ na tu balibhāvalagnatāyāḥ |
uttuṅgaiḥ kucakalaśair abhāri tāsāṃ sadvṛttair api caturaśratāśrayā śrīḥ || 27 ||

div.p:
balī balavāṃ
s tadbhāve lagnatā prasaktis tato yā abhraṣṭās tāḥ kathaṃ balābhāvena niḥsahatvaṃ yāntīti vi
rodhaḥ | avirodhas tu—valayaḥ santi yasya tad valibham_ | ‘tundivalivaṭer bhaḥ’ | valibham a
valagnaṃ madhyaṃ yasya tadbhāvād acyutatvāt strīsamucitena durbalatvena niḥsahatvāc ca | ye sadvṛttāḥ
suparivartulās te kathaṃ catuṣkoṇā bhavantīti virodhaḥ | caturaśratā sarvatobhadratvam iti tv a
virodhaḥ || 27 ||

lg.l: rāmāṇāṃ karaṇagaṇair ivāṅgahārā nājahnuḥ śriyam atha mauktikair na hārāḥ || 28 ||

div.p:
aṅganānāṃ hārā mauktikaiḥ śobhāṃ svīcakrur eva | yathā karaṇagaṇair aṅga
hārāḥ | cārīnṛttahastādiyogajanyais talapuṣpādibhiḥ karaṇair nirvartyamānāḥ sthirahastādayo
'ṅgahārā yathāharanti śobhāṃ tathā mauktikair hārā ityarthaḥ | vispaṣṭadārḍhyā guṇās tantavaḥ |
prakaṭaś ca draḍhimaguṇo 'bhyāsotthaṃ sthairyam_ | sthānaṃ pradeśaḥ sthānāni ca vaiṣṇavādyāni |
uktaṃ ca—‘vaiṣṇavaṃ samapādaṃ ca vaiśākhaṃ maṇḍalaṃ tathā | pratyālīḍham athālīḍhaṃ sthānā
ny etāni ṣaḍ_ nṛṇām_ ||’ iti | lakṣaṇaṃ svarūpavyavasthāpako dharmaḥ | tac ca maṇiśāstre bharate
[ca] || 28 ||

lg.l: rambhorūratha caturaṅkalāñchitaśrīḥ pratyagrām atanuta nāṭikeva śobhām || 29 ||

div.p:
(śobhā yeṣāṃ apy uktaṃ) śṛṅgārasthitiramyeṇa pratihāsagarbhavyāpāreṇa ma
hāvyasanena ca nāyakenānuyātā | caturaṃ kṛtvā kalābhir nṛttagītādibhir āñchitā āyatā
śrīr yasyāḥ sā | ataś ca nāṭikeva | sāpi hi śṛṅgārasya rasasya sthitir yasyāṃ sā tathā
ramyo narbhagarbhasya kaiśikīvṛttibhedasya vyāpāro yasyāṃ sā | narmasphiñjanarmasphoṭanarmaga
rbhākhyāḥ kaiśikīvṛttibhedāḥ | tatra narmagarbhaḥ—‘vijñānarūpaguṇasaṃpadādibhir nāyakau guṇair yatra |
pracchannau vyavaharataḥ kāryavaśān narmagarbhaḥ saḥ ||’ iti lakṣitaḥ | tathā atanavo rasā hā
syādayo 'ṅgabhūtā yasyāṃ sā | nāyakena ca dhīralalitākhyena yuktā | caturbhir aṅkair viccheda
bhedaiḥ śrīr yasyās tādṛśī ca | uktaṃ ca—‘īrṣyāpraṇayakrodhaprasādaratiharṣasaṃpannā | bahunṛttagī
tavādyā śṛṅgārābhinayavinayasaṃyuktā || virahautsukya samāgamasukhānvitā nṛpaticaritasaṃ
baddhā | strīprāyā caturaṅkā lalitapadā nāṭikety uktā || yatrārthasya samāptir yatra ca bīja
svabhāvasaṃhāraḥ | kiṃcid avalagnabinduḥ so 'ṅka iti satāvagantavyaḥ ||’ iti || 29 ||

lg.l: mārgasthaṃ hariṇadṛśā janaṃ harantyā lāvaṇyaṃ jalanidhivelayeva bheje || 30 ||

div.p:
makara
ketanaḥ kāmaḥ | makarākhyāś ca prāṇina eva ketanaṃ cihnam_ | adharadalam eva vidrumalatā |
adhobhavatpattrā ca sā | mārgasthaṃ sadācārastham adhvasthaṃ ca harantyā rañjayantyā apavāhayantyā
ca | lāvaṇyaṃ saundaryaṃ kṣārarasatā ca || 30 ||

lg.l: saṃspṛṣṭaś caraṇatalena pakṣmalākṣyā saṃsaktaiḥ stabakaśatair aśokavṛkṣaḥ |
kṣepīyaḥ pathi vikasallatākulo 'bhūn mārgasthaḥ ka iva na bhājanaṃ vibhūteḥ || 31
nanv asmin rataguruṇā samaṃ nikuñje viśramya vyapanaya tāvad adhvakhedam |
ity ārād akṛta navāṃśukāñcalāgravyāsaktā vratatir ivārthanāṃ ramaṇyāḥ || 32 ||

div.p: rataguruḥ kāntaḥ || 32 ||

lg.l: anyasyā guru jaghanaṃ babhāra paścād ayāntyāḥ sphuṭam adhikaṃ sagauravatvam |
paśyantyāṃ pratiyuvatau sarāgam enāṃ yat kāntaś ciram anupālayāṃcakāra || 33 ||

div.p:
gauravaṃ
gurutā saṃmānaś ca || 33 ||

lg.l: anvīye madhukaramaṇḍalena tāvat saṃsarpann upavanamārutaḥ sugandhiḥ |
yāvat strīparimalagocaro na lebhe ko nādyaṃ tyajati padaṃ viśeṣalābhāt || 34

div.p:
anvīto 'nvitaḥ | sugandhir iti gandhasyettve tadekāntagrahaṇasya
coditatvād ittvaṃ na prāpnoti | atra naikāntiko gandhaḥ | evaṃ tarhi gandhasyāntarlī
natayā kṛtrimatvenāpratibhāsanādaikāntikatvam upacaritam itīttvaṃ na virudhyate | upamā
nād vā bhaviṣyati sugandhir iva sugandhir iti || 34 ||

lg.l: prārabdhā parabhṛtanartakena kūjā straiṇasya śrutim aharatprarocaneva || 35 ||

div.p:
prastāvo 'vasaraḥ prastāvanā
ca | yasyā lakṣaṇam_—‘naṭī vidūṣako vāpi pāripārśvaka eva ca | sūtradhāreṇa
sahitāḥ saṃlāpaṃ yatra kurvate || citrair vākyaiḥ svakāryotthair vīthyaṅgair anyathāpi vā’ | nāṭakasya
ca—‘pañcasaṃdhi caturvṛtti catuḥṣaṣṭyaṅgasaṃyutam_ | ṣaṭtriṃśallakṣaṇopetaṃ nāṭakaṃ paricakṣate ||’
iti || 35 ||

lg.l: bibhrāṇaṃ vasanam ivāntarāpi cūtaṃ sāmodasthiti girikarṇikābhirāmam |
gāṇikyaṃ savikaṭahāratāṃ dadhat tatkṣmābhartus taṭam anu kānanaṃ ca reje || 36 ||

div.p:
gāṇikyaṃ gaṇikāsamūhaḥ | ‘gaṇikāyāś ca’ ity aupasaṃkhyāniko yañ_ | tat_,
kānanaṃ ca giritaṭaṃ lakṣayitvā reje | antaram āpnotīty antarāpi keśamadhyaprāptaṃ cūtaṃ vasana
m iva bibhrat_ | vasanam apy antarā madhye picunā kāryāsena ūtaṃ vihitam_ | giri vāci
sāmodasthiti prahṛṣṭam_ | karṇikābhiḥ karṇālaṃkārair abhirāmam_ | saha vikaṭena hāreṇa vartate
yaḥ tadbhāvaṃ dadhat_ | kānanam api madhyavyāpi cūtaṃ bibhrat_ sasaurabhasthitibhir girikarṇikā
bhir oṣadhibhedair abhirāmam_, saha vividhaiḥ kaṭahāraiḥ puṣpabhedair vartate || 36 ||

lg.l: nirvāṇasthitim apavartitailam uccair avyāptaṃ na mṛdumarudvidhīyamānam |
taṃ prātastanam iva dīpakaṃ vilokya straiṇena dviguṇaratābhilāṣatāpe || 37 ||

div.p:
nirbāṇā niḥsṛ
tabāṇākhyakasumā sthitir yasya | apavartitā vātena calitā elā niṣkuṭyo dravyaviśeṣā
yatra | na vibhiḥ pakṣibhir āptam avyāptaṃ tādṛśaṃ na | api tu tair āptam eva | athavā nirbāṇāṃ
sthitiṃ viśeṣeṇa nāptam_ | api tu prāptam eveti yojyam_ | anyatra nirvāṇā praśāntā sthi
tir yatra | apagate vartis tailaṃ ca yasya | raviṇā āptaṃ na | tadudaye tasya praśamanāt_ | taṃ
girim_ | prātastanaṃ prābhātikam_ | āpe prāptā || 37 ||

lg.l: utkṣiptas taraladalāṅgulir vyaloki śyāmābhiḥ kara iva bhāskarasya padmaḥ 38

div.p: nur ivārthe || 38 ||

lg.l: gacchantaḥ pathi ghaṭitā nikuñjadeśe viśrāntāḥ kvacana parasparaṃ yuvānaḥ |
sauhārdaṃ vidadhur ayantraṇaṃ kriyāṇāṃ visrambhaḥ suhṛdi phalaṃ nanu pradhānam || 39

div.p:
yuvāna
iti ‘pumān striyā’ ity ekaśeṣaḥ || 39 ||

vāmetyādi kalāpakam_ | pāribhadrās taruviśeṣāḥ
|| 40 ||

lg.l: aikṣiṣṭa bhramarakulaiḥ kṛtaṃ gurutvaṃ vallīnāṃ yuvatijanas tadā natānām |
kasyārthī na bhavati gauravāya loke saṃpannābhimataphalaḥ samāśrito vā || 43

div.p: (cakkalakam_)

harayo vānarāḥ | sālās taravas tadviśeṣā vā, prākā
rāś ca | rāmāḥ striyaḥ, rāmaś ca dāśarathiḥ | śukānāṃ sāraṇamānayanam_ | śukasāraṇau ca
rāvaṇaspaśau | ghanair mustai rucirā akṣā vibhītakā yeṣu taiḥ sānubhir vyāptā, ghanarucibhiś ca
jaladaprabhai rākṣasair anuviddhā || 44 ||

lg.l: ānandaṃ marud atanot tanūdarīṇāṃ kaḥ śreyānadhikaguṇatvam āpya na syāt || 45 ||

div.p:
kaṣāyo rasaś cetoharo vā | śabdasparśaguṇasya vāyo
r gandhākhyo guṇo naiva svābhāvikaḥ, yas tūpalabdhaḥ sa kusumasaṃbhava ity adhiko 'sau guṇaḥ || 45

lg.l: eko 'pi prasavaśaraḥ sa kena sahyo nānātmā kimu gaṇanātigocaro yaḥ |
tadbhinne hṛdi caritārtha eva kāmo māninyāṃ na unar abhūd adhijyacāpaḥ || 46

div.p: gaṇanātigocaraḥ saṃkhyātikrāntiviṣayaḥ || 46 ||

lg.l: vāsantyaḥ kusumabhṛtaś ca kundavallyo graiṣmyaś ca pratigiri pāṭalāḥ praphullāḥ |
anyonyaṃ yuvatijanasya mānabhaṅgaprāgalbhyaṃ vyatijahasus tarām ivārāt || 47

div.p:
vasante puṣpyanti vāsantyaḥ | ‘kā
lāt sādhupuṣpyatpacyamāneṣu’ ity aṇ_ | vyatijahasur iti karmavyatihāre ‘itaretarānyonyopa
padāc ca’ ity ātmanepadābhāvaḥ || 47 ||

lg.l: prārambhe pariṇatim āpa mānadhairyaṃ sugrīṣme mukulam ivātha kundapuṣpam || 48 ||

div.p:
pariṇatir naśyad avasthatvam_ | sugrīṣmo vasantaḥ |
tathā ca prayogaḥ—‘sugrīṣmake na dṛṣṭo na ca māghaniśāsu dīrghadīrghāsu | draṣṭavyā(vyaḥ)
pathika puro hatāśayā tvaṃ kathaṃ na(nu) mayā ||’ iti | atra kundapuṣpaṃ mukulāvastham eva
naśyati | tasya prāyeṇa śaiśiratvāt_ || 48 ||

lg.l: abhyarṇā śarad iva nimnagātaṭorvīm ānandaṃ vyatanuta mattakāśinīnām || 49 ||

div.p:
pratyagrair aṅkurai racitaśriyam_, pratyagrāṃ kurarākhyaiḥ
pakṣibhiś citaśriyaṃ ca | pattriṇaḥ pakṣiṇaḥ śarāś ca | śaradi nadītaṭeṣu dhānuṣkair abhyasyadbhiḥ
saśūtkārāḥ śarāḥ kṣipyante | mattakāśinī pragalbhā yoṣit_ || 49 ||

lg.l: utsṛjya pravikacacūtayaṣṭim uccais tṛṣṇāndhā api paribabhramur dvirephāḥ |
kāntāsye śvasitasugandhini prakarṣān naivārtā laghuni pade bhavanti dhīrāḥ || 50

div.p:
dhīrāḥ svalpake sthāne
naivārtā dainyabhājo bhavanti || 50 ||

lg.l: saṃsthānaṃ dadhad upari cchadatrayasya tretāgnisthitisadṛśaṃ nitambinībhiḥ |
nṛtyantyāḥ pavanavaśāl latāṅganāyāḥ kāṅgūlaḥ kara iva pallavo vyaloki || 51

div.p:
tretāgnir āhanīyādivahnitrayī | tatra sthityā sa
dṛśaṃ saṃniveśaṃ bibhrat_ | triṣu pallaveṣv agniṣv avoparisaṃniveśena vartamāna ityarthaḥ | ata eva
kaṇḍūlā(kāṅgūlā)khyo hasta iva | tatra hy aṅguṣṭatarjanīmadhyamānāṃ tretāgnivadupaviṣṭānā
m upari vakratayā pṛṣṭhapātinyanāmikā vartate | yad uktam_—‘tretāgnisaṃsthitā madhyātarjanya
ṅguṣṭhakā yadā | kāṅgūlo nāmikā vakrā tathā cordhvā kanīyasī ||’ iti || 51 ||

lg.l: bibhrāṇair adhikaguṇatvam aṅganānāṃ hastāgraiḥ prasabham akāri pallavānām |
pratyagrojjvalanijaśobhayā sarāgair bhagnānām api punar ukta eva bhaṅgaḥ || 52 ||

div.p:
bha
gnānāṃ jitānām api punar ukta eva bhaṅgaś chedanam akāri | chinnānāṃ ca cchedanaṃ punar uktam eva
|| 52 ||

lg.l: āditsor drumaviṭapāgravartipuṣpaṃ puṣpatve 'py amṛtaphalatvam eva bhīroḥ || 53 ||

div.p:
yat puṣpaṃ kathaṃ tad aṅganāyāḥ phalatvam āpnuyād iti virodhaḥ | puṣpasya phalarūpatā
pattau kā viruddhārthateti cet_, āha—puṣpatve 'pīti | sati hi pariṇāme puṣpasya phala
rūpatā, na tu svarūpa evāvasthitasyetya(ti)virodhaḥ || 53 ||

niṣphalo 'pi tarus taru
ṇīśleṣāt phalam abhyadhikaṃ prāpa || 54 ||

lg.l: śākhāgrasthiti kusumaṃ taror jighṛkṣur yatpīnastanavinatā śaśāka nāptum |
tatrāsīd rataguruṇā vilūya datte pratyakṣaṃ pratiyuvateḥ samunnatā strī || 55 ||

div.p: samunnatā garvitāpi || 55 ||

lg.l: divyastrīkarajaparikṣatais tarūṇāṃ tāruṇyaṃ saphalam abhāri pallavaughaiḥ || 56 ||

div.p:
rasaḥ śṛṅgāro 'pi |
rāgaḥ saktir api | pallavā viṭā api || 56 ||

lg.l: bhagnānām agaṇitatadvipattidoṣair vallīnāṃ madhu kusumeṣv apāyi bhṛṅgaiḥ |
yuktānāṃ taralatayā malīmasānāṃ na svārthāt kvacid atiricyate 'nurodhaḥ || 57 ||

div.p:
agaṇitā vallīnāṃ vipattir yatra pāne | ma
līmasāḥ pāpā api || 57 ||

lg.l: kurvāṇā pṛthuni vadhūr nitambabimbe visrastaṃ vasanam anāsthadurvinītam |
vispaṣṭām anurahasaṃ priyasya nānyā na vyāñjīn nidhuvanalālasāṃ sphurantīm 58

div.p:
anāsthadurvinītaṃ helayā duṣprāvṛtam_ | anurahasam ekānte |
‘anvavataptādrahasaḥ’ ity ac_ | na na vyāñjīt prakaṭīcakāraiva | lālasā spṛhā || 58 ||

lg.l: tadvartmany aviśata kācid iṅgitajñā no kārye kvacana bhavanti dīrghasūtrāḥ || 59

div.p: ya iṅgitaṃ na jānanti te 'pi kvacid api kārye dīrghasūtrāḥ kālakṣepiṇo na bhavanti || 59 ||

lg.l: niḥśvāsair aviralasaurabhair vikṛṣṭaḥ śyāmāyāḥ karakamalena saṃbhramantyāḥ |
babhrāmābhimukham apākṛto 'pi bhṛṅgaḥ paryāptaṃ na khalu malīmasasya dhārṣṭyam 60

div.p: saṃbhramantyāḥ sasaṃbhramāyāḥ | neti kākvā || 60 ||

lg.l: kāntānāṃ karakamalair anaukahānāṃ lupteṣu prasabham upetya pallaveṣu |
dhūtānām upavanavāhibhiḥ samīraiḥ kiṃ citraṃ yadasumanaskatāvirāsīt || 61 ||

div.p:
anaukahās taravaḥ | asumanaskatā ni
ṣpuṣpatvam_ | yasya ca pallavā aṅgabhūtāś chidyante tasyāsumanaskatā daurmanasyaṃ bhavati || 61 ||

lg.l: pluṣyantī sapadi manāṃsi māninīnāmātāmracchavir abhiluṅkhiteva vallī || 62 ||

div.p: dhūmyā dhūmasamūhaḥ | mālādibhyo yaḥ | abhiluṅkhitā jvalitā || 62 ||

lg.l: nīlābjaṃ śravaṇavataṃsatāṃ taruṇyā yad bhartrā vikacamanīyatānataṃ sat |

div.p:
ānataṃ srastam_
|| 63 ||

lg.l: na śreyān samam adhikaśriyā virodho yuktātra praṇatir itīva pīvarorvāḥ |
uttaṃsotpalam avanamya dūram akṣṇaḥ prāstāvītstavam iva cañcarīkaśabdaiḥ || 64 ||

div.p:
avisaṃsthulān upahatā sphulaśrīḥ paṭamaṇḍapaśobhā kāmasya kusumapradhānai
s tarubhiḥ saṃpāditā || 65 ||

lg.l: paryaśrusrutiparipāṭalatvam akṣṇoḥ kurvāṇaṃ manasi manoramaṃ vyalīkam |
māninyo raja iva cakṣuṣi praviṣṭaṃ saṃrambhasphuradadharā na paryamṛṣyan || 66 ||

div.p:
manoramaḥ preyān_ | vyalīkaṃ gotraskhalitādivipriyam_
|| 66 ||

lg.l: kurvāṇāmadhitaru sugrahe 'pi puṣpe hastāgraṃ sapadi yuvā svayaṃ praditsuḥ |
naikatra śravasi tathā sahematāḍītāṭaṅke 'py akṛta vadhūḥ prasādhitāsthām |

div.p:
hematāḍye yaḥ tāṭaṅkaḥ karṇābharaṇam_ | tatsahite 'py ekasmin karṇe prasādhi
tāsthāṃ maṇḍito 'yam iti buddhiṃ tathā vadhūr nākṛta yathā sapatnīsaṃmukhaṃ priyaniveśitena pa
llavena subhage dvitīye || 68 ||
pariveśaḥ paridhiḥ || 69 ||

lg.l: unnidracchadam upadeti puṣpam ārād ānītaṃ dayitatamena menakāśrīḥ |

div.p:
upadā ḍhaukanikā | vibbo
kaś ceṣṭāviśeṣas tenāñcitaṃ vinihiñcitaṃ ca śiro yasyāḥ | uktaṃ ca—‘iṣṭānāṃ bhāvānāṃ
prāptāvatiharṣamānasaṃbhūtaḥ | strīṇām anādarakṛto vibboko nāma vijñeyaḥ || kiṃcit pārśvonnata
grīvaṃ śiro jñeyaṃ............... | ............ strīṇāṃ caitat prayojayet_ ||’ iti
|| 70 ||

lg.l: vyatyāsād dayitatamena kāpi nāmnaḥ prattāyām api sumanasyamarṣahetoḥ |
saṃrambhasphuradadharāruṇekṣaṇaśrīs tac cittraṃ yad asumanaskatāṃ prapede || 71 ||

div.p:
skhalanacchalanaṃ kṛtvā caraṇābhyāṃ durniviṣṭā satī kācit priyasya
śirasi śekharaṃ babandha | kandalī latā || 72 ||

lg.l: āmodāpahṛtamadhuvrataṃ natabhrūr uttaṃsaṃ śirasi babandha bandhuraśrīḥ || 73 ||

div.p: saṃrambhaḥ prayatnaḥ || 73 ||
(yugalakam_)

lg.l: dhūmenāviratam ivābhihanyamānaṃ bāṣpāmbhaḥ pratiyuvater mumoca cakṣuḥ || 74 ||
adhyāste hṛdayam akṛtrim apriyāṇāṃ kāntānām atibahumatsaro hy anaṅgaḥ || 75 ||

div.p:
sāśaṅkaṃ
sapatnībhogaśaṃsi | priyaṃ snehaḥ || 75 ||

lg.l: nirlakṣaṃ kusumaparigrahāya subhrūḥ saṃdaṃśaṃ suciram ababhramatkarāgram || 76 ||

div.p:
saṃbādho janabāhulyam_ | raṇaraṇakam utkaṇṭhā | pa
ñcamo grāmarāgabhedaḥ | nirlakṣaṃ nirviṣayam_ | anyatra gatacittatvāt_ | saṃdaṃśākhyaṃ karāgram a
bhramayat_ | ‘tarjanyaṅguṣṭhasaṃyogas tv arālasyaṃ yadā bhavet_ | abhugnatalamadhyaś ca sa saṃdaṃśa iti
smṛtaḥ’ || 76 ||

lg.l: sagrīvānirupamarecako jajṛmbhe rambhor vā dayitavilokanena hāvaḥ || 77 ||

div.p:
akṣibhruvam iti acaturādisūtre nipātitam_ | vipakṣavāmaḥ sapatnīpra
tikūlaḥ | recako bhramaṇam_ | hāvaś ceṣṭāviśeṣaḥ | uktaṃ ca—‘prāpteṣu śṛṅgārarasāśrayeṣu
bhāveṣu kāmāṅkuracihnabhūtam_ | utpatsyate yat smitavīkṣitottham unmīlitaṃ ramyatayā sa hāvaḥ ||’
iti || 77 ||

lg.l: hāraughaiḥ pravigalitaṃ payodharebhyo nodvṛttaiḥ saha guṇināṃ cirāya yogaḥ || 78

div.p: udvṛttā unnatavartulā upaplutāś ca | guṇas tantuḥ saujanyaṃ ca || 78 ||

lg.l: kāntasya pramadamudāranṛttalīlā rambhorūr atanuta kaiśikīva vṛttiḥ || 79 ||

div.p:
nepathyam ākalpaḥ | masṛṇam anuddhatam_ | āsthā sthitiḥ | raso rāgaḥ | kaiśikī nāma vṛ
ttir avasthāviśeṣaḥ | ‘yā ślakṣṇanepathyaviśeṣacitrā strīsaṃyutā yā bahunṛttagītā | kāmo
pabhogaprabhavopacārā tāṃ kaiśikīṃ nāma vadanti vṛttim_ ||’ iti || 79 ||

lg.l: kāntānāṃ citarasasaṃcitena ceto rāmābhir madakilakiñcitena jahre || 80 ||

div.p:
śekharo gucchaḥ |
rasaḥ svādaḥ | madena kilakiñcitaṃ ceṣṭāviśeṣaḥ | ‘śuṣkaṃ kṣaṇaṃ praruditaṃ kṣaṇam aśrupātaḥ
krodho muhurhasitam āśu punaś ca gītam_ | vyāmiśrarūpam iha harṣarasaprayuktam uktaṃ janaiḥ śrutadhanaiḥ
kilakiñcitākhyam_’ || 80 ||

lg.l: bibhrāṇā śrutisukhatāṃ manoramaśrīr yāntīnāṃ vanabhuvi mattakāśinīnām |
māyūrī kalavirutiḥ svarāśrayatvaṃ saṃprāptā vyatanuta mārjaneva śobhām || 81

div.p:
śrutau karṇe śrutibhiś ca sukhatā sukhakāritvam_ | svarāra
mbhakā dhvanayaḥ kalasvarāḥ kākalīprabhṛtidvāviṃśatibhedāḥ śrutayaḥ | māyūrī mayūrasaṃba
ndhinī virutiḥ kekā svarasya ṣaḍjasyāśrayatāṃ prāptā | ‘ṣaḍjaṃ vadati mayūraḥ’ ity ukteḥ |
māyūryākhyā mura(ja)jā mārjanā svarāśrayaḥ | uktaṃ ca—‘gāndhāro vāmake kāryaḥ ṣaḍjo
dakṣiṇapuṣkare | ūrdhvake pañcamaś caiva māyūryāstu svarāḥ smṛtāḥ ||’ iti || 81 ||

lg.l: prāptāyā rahasi manorameṇa yogaṃ rāmāyāḥ pramadabharotthamīkṣaṇāmbhaḥ |
pattrālīṃ sapadi dudhāva gaṇḍabhittāvaśreyo jagati bhavej jaḍān na keṣām || 82 ||
akṣuṇṇā bata śatamanyutā taveyaṃ sāścaryā subhaga vinirmame vidhātrā |
niḥśaṅkaṃ vidadhata eva gotrabhedaṃ vajras te nivasati vāci yan na pāṇau || 83 ||

div.p: akṣuṇṇā navā | śatamanyutā śatāparādhatā indratā ca || 83 ||

lg.l: ity ārād abhidadhuṣīṃ punaḥ sapatnīnām naivāvanataśirā yuvānunīṣuḥ |
bāṣpāmbhaḥplutanayanāṃ vijṛmbhitāntaḥsaṃtāpām api yuvatiṃ vyadhāt sahāsām || 84

div.p: (yugalakam_)

lg.l: nirmānā yuvatir abhūd rate vidheyā nautsukyāṃ vrajati hi ramyadarśanāt kaḥ || 85 ||
sasraṃse yuvatijanasya karṇamūlād ārūḍho vinipatatīti nātra citram || 86 ||
kāntāyāḥ kusumarajo vilocanasthaṃ yat preyān vadanasamīraṇair nirāsthat |
tenaiva pratiyuvateḥ samīpabhājaḥ kāluṣyaṃ yugalam anāyi dūram akṣṇoḥ || 87 ||
aklāmyadbhujalatikātisaukumāryāt sadvṛttair api khalu khedam eti kaścit || 88 ||

div.p:
sadupalā maṇayaḥ | tanmayaiḥ pattrair maṇḍanaśrīr yasyāḥ | sadvṛttaiḥ śubhācārair api
|| 88 ||

lg.l: vicchittiṃ vapuṣi vilokya vallabhāyāḥ prāṇeśo vipulavilocanotsavo 'bhūt 89

div.p:
śuṣkā nirarthakā kuṃ ṭhuṃ ityādayo varṇā yasya tādṛggītatulye | tad dhi vaktrapā
ṇināmnā pūrvaraṅgeṇa śobhate | uktaṃ ca—‘nāṭyavṛttivibhāgāya vaktrapāṇir vidhīyate’ iti |
‘mālyācchādanabhūṣāvilepanānāmanādaranyāsaḥ | svalpo 'pi mūrtiśobhāṃ janayati yaḥ sā tu
vicchittiḥ’ || 89 ||

ābadhya umbhitvā | niḥspandatayā jharaṅkaśaṅkā tṛṇapuruṣabhrāntiḥ
|| 90 ||

lg.l: ādātuṃ sutanur iyeṣa cāvahitthaṃ premāho yuvatiṣu maugdhyadurvidagdham || 91 ||

div.p: avahittham ākārasaṃvaraṇam_ | durvidagdhaṃ duḥśikṣitam_ || 91 ||

lg.l: utsṛjya sphuṭaravarṇaśobham ārān nirgandhaṃ yuvatijano 'tha karṇikāram |
āditsuḥ surabhitayā lavaṅgam abhyaidākārād api guṇa eti vallabhatvam || 92 ||
saṃrambhād aliyuvabhir vitanyamāno na strībhir na navalatotsavaḥ śaśaṃse || 93 ||

div.p:
makara
ndasya śīdhuna(dho)ś ca pāne vyāsaṅgaḥ prasaktiḥ | strībhir vitanyamāno 'libhir yuvabhiś ca
yathākramaṃ navā latā evotsavo navalatākhyaś ca vasantotsavo 'bhinanditaḥ | ‘yatrābhinavayā
vadhvā latayeva madhau drumaḥ | svayam āliṅgyate kāntaḥ sa syān navalatotsavaḥ’ || 93 ||

lg.l: saugandhyād aviralakāntisaukumāryāt tadvaktrair atha vijitaḥ sarojakhaṇḍaḥ |
bhṛṅgaughaiḥ kvacid api nādhyavatsyatārād vañcyante na khalu parair viśeṣaniṣṭhāḥ || 94 ||

div.p:
kāntiḥ saukumāryaṃ ceti dvandvaḥ | adhyavatsyata adhiṣṭhitaḥ | viśeṣe niṣṭhā arthitā yeṣāṃ
te viśeṣaniṣṭhā viśeṣakuśalāḥ | (‘ninadībhyāṃ snāteḥ kauśale’ iti ṇatvam_) || 94 ||

lg.l: prāṇeśān atha saviśeṣam eva jahruḥ sādhīyo harati guṇāntareṇa guṇyaḥ || 95 ||

div.p:
mālyagrathane vikalpāḥ prakārā eva śilpāḥ kalāḥ | guṇyo guṇavān_ | yapprakaraṇe 'anye
bhyo 'pi—' iti yammatvarthīyaḥ || 95 ||

vilepanam aṅgarāgo makkolādirañjanaṃ ca | a
ṅgānāṃ ca vartanā yathāsvam abhinayāḥ | citre ca kūrcikādibhir unmīlanā | nāṭyaṃ nṛttam eva
citraṃ tasya bhittīr ādhārabhūtāḥ || 96 ||

lg.l: gacchanti prakṛtimanoramāḥ kadācit kālena sphuṭam asatā guṇena yogam |
niḥśvāsaśvasanaparamparābhir āsāṃ saugandhyaṃ yad ucitamāpi karṇikāraiḥ || 97 ||

div.p:
kālena samayena sphuṭaṃ prakaṭam_ | asatā avi
dyamānena | śvasano vāyuḥ || 97 ||

lg.l: preyasyā nibiḍanitambabimbaśobhām āditsuḥ kusumamayīṃ vidhāya kāñcīm |
yām ārāt sarasamanā yuvopaninye saṃsargāt pratiyuvateḥ kṛtāparādhaḥ || 98 ||
prāptas tat smaraṇasaroṣapāṭalākṣyā sasmerānananalinas tayā babandhe |
prāyeṇa hy ananuguṇe vidhāv upaiti dhyātor 'thaḥ pariṇatim anyathaiva puṃsām || 99 ||

div.p:
prāpto 'vaṣṭabdhaḥ san_ tasyāparādhasmaraṇena pā
ṭaladṛśā preyasyā sa yuvā tayā kāñcyā nibaddhaḥ || 99 ||
(yugalakam_)

lg.l: svedāmbhaḥkaṇanikaraṃ mumoca subhrūḥ śephālī pavanahateva puṣpavarṣam || 100 ||

div.p: mamluṣī mlānā || 100 ||

lg.l: anyasyā vipinavihāravibhrameṇa śrāntāyā dayitatamaṃ jahāra dṛṣṭiḥ || 101

div.p:
pramlānetyādinā śrāntākhyā dṛṣṭir varṇitā | yasyā lakṣaṇam_—‘śramapramlānitapuṭā śyā
māntāñcitalocanā | sann ā patitatārā ca śrāntā dṛṣṭiḥ prakīrtitā ||’ iti | añcitau
prasṛtau | nipatite adhomukhe || 101 ||

lg.l: bhrāntāyā giritaṭakānane mṛgākṣyāḥ prekṣyatvaṃ dayitatamasya jagmivāṃsaḥ |

div.p:
nakhā nakhakṣatāni | ye cāṅkā nāṭakādyavayavās te
bindunā citrā janasya priyatvam upagatā bhrājante | bindur arthaprakṛtiḥ | yad uktam_—‘prayoja
nānāṃ vicchede yad avicchedakāraṇam_ | yāvat samāptir bandhasya sa bindur iti kīrtitaḥ ||
yo mukhasaṃdhau kṣiptaḥ kila vasati caturṣv api samantāt_ | tailasya bidurambhasi yathā sa bī
jāśrayo binduḥ ||’ iti || 102 ||

lg.l: ālīva drutam alikhallatā kapole nirdhautāṃ śramasalilena pattravallīm || 103 ||

div.p: āsajadbhir nīyamānaiḥ | ālī sakhī || 103 ||

lg.l: bhṛṅgebhyo bhṛśataramasvadanta vallyo bhāvānāṃ bhavati kutaḥ prakarṣaniṣṭhā || 104

div.p:
bhṛ
ṅgebhya iti ‘rucyarthānāṃ prīyamāṇaḥ’ iti saṃpradānatā | svado rucyarthatvāt_ | tasya mukhendoḥ
dṛṣṭau darśane || 104 ||

lg.l: vispaṣṭaṃ vratatir adarśayanmukhenduṃ bhavyānāṃ bhavati yatas tator 'thasiddhiḥ || 105

div.p:
manasija eva nṛttopādhyāyas tasyāspadatāṃ gatāḥ sudṛśo
vihārānte vanotsaṅgān nirīyuḥ | nartakya iva | tā āpi | pātratvaṃ rāmādy anukartṛtā | nāṭakā
disamāptā vaṅkād abhinīyamānān nāṭakādy avayavān nartakapūrvaṃ niḥsaranti pūrvatra viṣkambho vi
stāras tatsthityā viśadapraveśāḥ sugamāḥ panthāno yatreti yojyam_ | itaratra viṣkambho vi
ṣkambhakaḥ | praveśaḥ praveśakaḥ | viṣkambhavatpraveśakasvarūpaṃ yatretyarthaḥ | aṅke hi viṣkambha
praveśakau kathopakṣepakāritayā prāyaśaḥ sadṛśau | ataś caikam evāṅke prayuñjate kavayaḥ | ‘śuddhaḥ
saṃkīrṇo vā dvividho viṣkambhako 'tra vijñeyaḥ | madhyamapuruṣaḥ śuddhaḥ saṃkīrṇo nīcama
dhyakṛtaḥ || parijanakathānuviddhaḥ praveśako nāma vijñeyaḥ | nottamamadhyamapuruṣair ācarito
nāpy udāttavacanakṛtaḥ || prākṛtabhāṣācāraprayogam āsādya kartavyaḥ’ || 106 ||

lg.l: spaṣṭehāmṛgaḍimavīthikaṃ sadaṅkavyāyogaṃ tad anu vihṛtya niḥsahāṅgyaḥ |

div.p:
spaṣṭa īhā
mṛgāṇāṃ vṛkāṇāṃ ḍimo yuddhaṃ yatra tathāvidhā vīthikāḥ panthāno yatra | śobhane 'ṅke utsaṅge
vīnāṃ pakṣiṇām āyogaḥ saṃbandho yatra | sphuṭā daśā svocitāvasthā yeṣāṃ teṣāṃ rūpakāṇāṃ
mṛgārbhakāṇāṃ vyavasthā sthitir yatra | atha ca—‘nāṭakaṃ ca prakaraṇam aṅko vyāyoga
eva ca | bhāṇaḥ samavakāraś ca vīthī prahasanaṃ ḍimaḥ | īhāmṛgaś ca vijñeyo daśamaḥ kāvya
lakṣaṇe ||’ iti yad daśarūpakākhyaṃ kāvyaṃ tad vadavatiṣṭhamānam_ | ‘divyapuruṣā......tkṛto
divyastrīkāraṇopagatayuddhaḥ | īhāmṛgas tu kāryaḥ susamāhitakāvyabandhaś ca || prakhyātavastu
viṣayaḥ prakhyātodāttanāyakaś caiva | ṣaḍvasulakṣaṇayuktaś caturaṅko vai ḍimaḥ kāryaḥ ||’ ityādi da
śarūpakasya lakṣaṇam abhihitaṃ daśarūpakādhyāye || 107 ||

lg.l: sundaryaḥ katham api tadvanaṃ jahus tā ramyāḥ syuḥ ka iva hi sutyajāḥ padārthāḥ 108

div.p:
rāsakā mṛgaviśeṣā evāṅkaś ci
hnam_ | rāsakāṅkaś ca kohalokto nāṭyaprakāraḥ | uktaṃ ca—‘aṣṭau ṣoḍaśa dvātriṃśad yatra
nṛtyanti gāyakāḥ | piṇḍībandhānusāreṇa tan nṛttaṃ rāsakaṃ viduḥ ||’ iti | tālās taruvi
śeṣāḥ, cañcapuṭacācapuṭādayaś ca || 108 ||

lg.l: preyobhiḥ samam avagāhya kānanorvīṃ dehārdhasthitir iva śūliśailaputryoḥ |
rāmābhir na rucirasaikatābhirāmā nāloki tridaśataraṅgiṇī vidūrāt || 109

div.p: ruciraiḥ saikatair abhirāmā || 109 ||

lg.l: prauḍhatvād dayitatamena kāpi sārdhaṃ prastāvaṃ vyatanuta kovidā ralīnām || 110

div.p:
kovidā
rāś camarakākhyās taravaḥ | tatra līnāṃ bhramarapaṅktim ālokya kācit kovidā ralīnāṃ goṣṭīnāṃ
prastāvam akarot_ || 110 ||

kiṅkiṇyo ghaṇṭikāḥ | auṇādiko 'tra kiṅkiṇīkāśabdaḥ
‘caṅkaṇaḥ kiṅkiṇa ca’ iti || 111 ||

hetiśālā jayanaśālā iti prasiddhāḥ || 112
||

taraṅgavāta eva caṭulaṃ dolanaṃ dolā yeṣāṃ tāni vikasanti svarṇapadmāni ya
syām_ | ratnacūrṇam eva dhūlis tatpradhānās taṭabhuvo yasyām_ | syandinī nadī || 114 ||
(yugalakam_)

iti śrībālabṛhaspatyanujīvino vāgīśvarāṅkasya vidyādhipatyaparanāmno mahākave
rājānakaśrīratnākarasya kṛtau ratnāṅke haravijaye mahākāvye
kusumāvacayavarṇano nāma saptadaśaḥ sargaḥ |

iti
rājānakajayānakasūnor alakasya kṛtau haravijayaviṣamapadoddyote saptadaśaḥ sargaḥ ||
aṣṭādaśaḥ sargaḥ |

aṅgānābhirātapo netracchāyānipātena khaṇḍitaḥ | chāyā kāntiḥ | tayā cātape pa
tantyā chāyā vyadhīyateti taddvāreṇātapadhvaṃsaḥ | chāyā vā pratibimbam_ || 1 ||

lg.l: chattrāṇy uccair dhāryamāṇāni tāsāṃ haimaiḥ pāṇḍūny anvamīyanta daṇḍaiḥ || 2 ||

div.p:
lāvaṇyasa
hitā kāntir lāvaṇyakāntiḥ | haimaiḥ suvarṇamayair vikāraiḥ | ‘prāṇirajatādibhyo 'j_’ | he
maśabdo rajatādiṣu na paṭhyata iti cet_, tarhi tatrāpaṭhito 'py upasaṃkhyeyaḥ | haimaśabdasya
bahuśaḥ śiṣṭaprayogadarśanāt_ | dṛśyate yathā jātiṣu triphalāśabdaḥ | aṇi tu ‘an_’ iti
prakṛtibhāve haimanair iti syāt_ || 2 ||

lg.l: tiryagjyotsnāpāṇḍubhāsā dhṛtena cchattreṇānyā rājati sma vrajantī |

div.p: svicchabda ivārthe || 3 ||

lg.l: ramyābhogair gauratām udvahadbhiḥ prauḍhasyendor bimbaśobhām avāptaiḥ |
chattraiś chāyātāni sīmantinīnāṃ vaktraiś cārāc cārunetrābhirāmaiḥ || 4 ||

div.p:
atāni prasāritā | ne
trāṇi nayanāni dugūlāni ca || 4 ||

lg.l: mārgoddhūtā dhūlayo dhūsaratvaṃ māsāṃ kārṣuḥ svacchalāvaṇyakānteḥ |

div.p: adhunvan kampayām āsuḥ | vallaryaḥ śākhāḥ || 6 ||

lg.l: kāñcīnaddhaiḥ sthūlabimbair nitambaiḥ saṃbādhatvaṃ vartmanaḥ kurvatībhiḥ |
abhraṣṭo 'pi cchāyayā nihnutaḥ sann āpa vyaktiṃ yāvakīyo rasaughaḥ || 8 ||

div.p:
pādāṅgadāni pādakaṭakās teṣu nūpureṣu kvacid ekadeśe pratibaddhānāṃ padmarāga
maṇīnāṃ prabhayā tiraskṛtatvād aṅganānām agalitasyālaktakasya raso nālakṣyata | kvacit_ ‘pra
bhraṣṭaḥ’ iti pāṭhaḥ | tadā anihnuta ity akārapraśleṣaḥ vidhiś ca vākyārtho veditavyaḥ || 8
||

lg.l: agre yāntaṃ kānanālokanecchāvyagratvāt tvaṃ vīkṣito no mayeti |
vyājādākhyadvallabhaṃ pīvarābhyāmāhaty ārāt kāpi pṛṣṭhe stanābhyām || 9 ||
gacchantīnāṃ nūpurakvāṇakṛṣṭā haṃsaśreṇyo dhṛṣṭam agre sarantyaḥ |
spaṣṭāgaskaṃ jīviteśaṃ vidhūya pratyāsannaṃ manyunāgre vrajantīm |

div.p: ālī sakhī || 11 ||

lg.l: sīmantinyāḥ saṃsarantyāḥ salīlaṃ vartmany ārāt pīnatuṅgastanāgrāt |
prālambena cchinnasūtreṇa pete yogyaḥ pātaḥ sarvathā nirguṇānām || 12 ||

div.p:
prālambaḥ sragdāma hāro vā | guṇas tantur api
|| 12 ||

lg.l: yā pādānām ujjvalā śrīramīṣām ambhojānāṃ sā kuto 'bhyeti mugdhāḥ |
mañjīraugho mañjunā śiñjitena prītyetīva vyājahārātha haṃsān || 13 ||

div.p: abhyeti abhyāgacchati || 13 ||

lg.l: amlāyadbhir vibhramāmbhojakhaṇḍair ambhorūḍhair āpi mārge vikāsaḥ || 14 ||

div.p:
rambhoravaḥ pramadās tābhi rūḍhair dhṛtaiḥ, a
mbhasi ca rūḍhair utpanair āpi prāptā || 14 ||
induvaktrāḥ sumukhyaḥ || 15 ||

lg.l: śānteḥ śaśvatsajjalābhāṃ niṣadyāṃ puṇyāṃ loke vīcibhaṅgapragalbhām |

div.p:
satī jala
syābhā yasyāḥ sajjaś ca saṃmukho lābho vāṇijakānāṃ vṛddhir yasyām_ | śānter upaśamasya
niṣadyā āpaṇaḥ | puṇyā pavitrā | vīcibhaṅge taraṅgāṇāṃ dvidhākaraṇe pragalbhā prabhuḥ | yāpi
puṇyā puṇyavatī sā lokasya avīcibhaṅge naraka[viśeṣa]bhede kṣamā | puṣkarāṇi pa
dmāni | āvartāḥ salilarūpakāḥ | tāni pratyāsīdanti yatra tādṛśaḥ kaugho jalapravāho
yasyāḥ | kalpāntavelāpi samupaviśatpuṣkarāvartakākhyajaladavṛndā bhavati || 16 ||
recitaṃ tyaktam_ || 17 ||
(tilakam_)

lg.l: saṃsarpantyā maṅktum ety ādhirodhaḥ sīmantinyā nirjitānvīkṣya gatyā |

div.p: nirāsthat_ nicikṣepa | ‘asyates thuk_’ || 18 ||

sa
rvam aṅgaṃ vyāpnoti sarvāṅgīṇaḥ | ‘tatsarvādeḥ pathyaṅga—’ iti khaḥ || 20 ||

lg.l: tīrotsaṅgāt tuṅgatām ādadhānād bhraśyantīnām āśu sīmantinīnām |
ambhobhāge nirjhariṇyā gurutvāt tāsāṃ pete pīvaraiḥ prāṅnitambaiḥ || 22 ||

div.p: ākṛṣṭā āhṛtā | anukṛteti yāvat_ || 23 ||

lg.l: āyāntīnāṃ tīrahaṃsīninādas tāsaṃ jigye mekhalābhir yakābhiḥ |

div.p:
yakābhir yābhiḥ | ‘avyayasarvanāmnāṃ—’
iti svārthe 'kac_ || 24 ||

pīḍā balavad ākramaṇaṃ vyathā ca | gāḍhaṃ nibiḍam āśritaṃ ca
|| 25 ||

lg.l: śītālutvād apy anicchur nimaṅktuṃ kācit toyaṃ cittanāthānurodhāt |
rodhaḥsīmno nimnagāyā jagāhe kiṃ tat premṇā kāryate yan na lokaḥ || 26 ||

div.p:
śītaṃ na sahate śītāluḥ | ‘śītoṣṇatṛprebhyas tan na sahate’ ity ālupratyayaḥ |
rodha eva sīmā avadhiḥ || 26 ||
śṛṅgakaṃ kanakam ayaṃ śṛṅgam_ || 27 ||

vyākṣepo vyā
pāraḥ || 28 ||
prāsaṅgo dairghyam_ | vaidagdhī bhaṅgīḥ || 29 ||

lg.l: viṣvagvṛttiṃ kautukeneva tāsām āṅgīṃ śobhām aṅganānām apaśyat || 30 ||

div.p:
vīcivaccaṭulāḥ vīciṣu ca
bhrāmyanto mīnā eva vikasvarāṇi cakṣūṃṣi yasya || 30 ||

lg.l: siktāmbhobhiḥ kāpi dūrāt sapatnīnām agrāhaṃ dāhasaṃvegam āpat |
śāntiṃ bheje 'nukṣitāpītarā svāṃ saṃjñāṃ śrutvā kīrtitāṃ vallabhena || 31 ||

div.p:
nāma gṛhītvā nāmagrāham_ |
‘nāmnyādiśigrahoḥ’ iti ṇamul_ || 31 ||

lg.l: kiṃjalkālīṃ no daduḥ kiṃ vidhattām udvṛttair vā saṃgato 'nyajjalaughaḥ || 32 ||

div.p:
vakṣojau stanau | udvṛtto durācāraḥ parivartu
laś ca | jalā jaḍā api || 32 ||

lg.l: āśiśleṣa smeravaktrāṃ striyaṃ tatsāphalyaṃ sā tatprasādasya mene || 33 ||
sādṛśyaṃ yaiḥ kalpyate strīmukhānāṃ phullāmbhojais te 'samīcīnabodhāḥ |

div.p:
asamīcīnam asamyak_ | antaraṃ viśeṣaḥ || 34
||

lg.l: dūrād eva strīmukhaupamyalakṣmīṃ yatsaṃprāptā yūyam etāv adas tu |
hrīhetur vo 'bhyarṇatetīva bhṛṅgair āśiñjānair abhyadhīyanta padmāḥ || 35 ||
tasthāv ambhorūḍham abjaṃ tathaiva syāt sādhyaḥ ko baddhamūlo jalānām || 37 ||

div.p: sādhyo vijeyaḥ || 37 ||

lg.l: āropya tvām aṅganaiṣādhikarṇaṃ nūnaṃ netracchāyayādhaḥ karoti |
udgcchadbhir narmaṇevormihastair hṛtvā dūraṃ phenahāsaṃ vyatānīt || 39 ||

div.p: atibhūmir atisneho 'pi || 39 ||

lg.l: romāñcālīm añcitāṃ kampam ūrvoḥ śītavyājātsītkṛtaṃ cādhitoyam |
kācit preyaḥkāmarāgottham agre pratyagroḍhā spaṣṭam ahnoṣṭa sakhyāḥ || 40 ||

div.p: preyān eva kāmaḥ | ahnoṣṭa nyagūhat_ || 40 ||

lg.l: prāyeṇetthaṃ śreyase vikriyāpi prādurbhūtā kalpate komalānām || 41 ||

div.p: komalāni jalāny api || 41 ||

lg.l: rodhohaṃsasvānalakṣmīṃ vyajeṣṭa spaṣṭaṃ yaḥ strīmekhalānāṃ ninādaḥ |
vicchinno 'sau sajjalaughair itīva srotasvinyā phanehāso vitene || 42 ||

div.p:
srota
svinī nadī || 42 ||

lg.l: bhraṣṭā reje kāminīnāṃ kucāgrakṣobhodbhūtā phenaphāliḥ sphurantī || 43 ||

div.p: phāliḥ khaṇḍikā || 43 ||

lg.l: muktājālaiḥ kartum aihiṣṭaṃ hāraṃ kasya syād vā maugdhyabhājo vivekaḥ || 46 ||
krīḍāmardāt subhruvo ratnakambor bhagnasyācchā koṭir akliṣṭakāntiḥ |
prabhraśyantī toyarāśer adhastāt tārāmārgād indulekheva reje || 47 ||
tābhir muktā dṛṣṭibāṇās tadānīṃ niḥsāraṅgāṃ cakrire kānanorvīm || 48 ||

div.p:
pa
ttrāṇi pakṣāḥ | āluṅkhitaḥ spṛṣṭaḥ | niḥsāraṅgā lajjayā nirgatamṛgā | mṛgaśūnyā ca
|| 48 ||

lg.l: sārdhaṃ strīṇāṃ vallabhair majjatīnām udvṛttatvād bhajyamānāḥ stanāgraiḥ |
rodhohaṃsavrātam āsus taraṅgā niḥsāmarthye śaktatāho jaḍānām || 49 ||

div.p:
udvṛttaḥ sadoṣo 'pi | rodhas taṭam_ | āsur anayan_ | asyater atra nayatyarthatvād dvikarma
katvam_ | jaḍāni jalāny api || 49 ||

lg.l: ścyotallāvaṇyāmṛtaṃ nirbharatvād ūrmivrātair gāḍham āpīya bhūyaḥ |

div.p:
āpīyeti ‘pīṅ_ pāne’ ity asya prayogaḥ | a
bhyudveme vāntam iva || 50 ||
vibbokinī yoṣit_ | vibbokaś ceṣṭāviśeṣa ity uktam_ || 51 ||
amān avartamānaḥ | udbharībhūyādhikatāṃ prāpya || 52 ||

lg.l: dhaute 'py akṣṇor añjane vīcibhaṅgair naisargikyā hānir āsīn na lakṣmyāḥ |
yenārabdhaṃ yan na tatra vyapete tasyābhāvāj jāyate 'tiprasaṅgaḥ || 53 ||

div.p:
yad yena nārabdhaṃ tatrānārabdhe(bdhake)
vinivṛtte tasyānārabdhasyābhāvo no yuktaḥ | tathātve 'tiprasaṅgo 'tivyāptir utpadyate |
kāraṇaṃ hi nivartamānaṃ kāryaṃ nivartayati | svabhāvo 'bhāvam_ | avyabhicārāt_ | anyathā
ghaṭapaṭayor apy ekataranivṛttāvaparanivṛttiḥ kena vāryeta | akāraṇam asvabhāvaś ca kajjalaṃ
cakṣuṣoḥ sahajalakṣmyā iti kathaṃ tadvigame sā hīyeta | uktaṃ ca—‘tasmāt tanmātrasaṃbaddhaḥ
svabhāvo 'bhāvam eva vā | nivartayet kāraṇaṃ vā kāryam avyabhicārataḥ ||’ iti || 53 ||

lg.l: pratyāsanne vīcibhaṅge muhūrtaṃ bimbāyātā kāpyakāśiṣṭa dhṛṣṭam |

div.p:
bi
mbāyātā bimbitā | sphurantī jīvantīva || 54 ||

lg.l: lekhāḥ sītā bibhratī madhyabhājaḥ subhrūr anyā kāmakedārabhūmiḥ |

div.p:
lekhā valya eva sītā halalekhāḥ |
madhyam udaram_ || 55 ||

lg.l: rodholekhāvartino dhārtarāṣṭrās tāsām agre rājahaṃsā ivāsan || 56 ||

div.p: dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ kṛṣṇacañcucaraṇā haṃsāḥ || 56 ||

lg.l: nītaṃ lāvaṇyāmṛteneva gaurīṃ chāyām āsīd ambu saṃdigdhaphenam || 57 ||

div.p:
agram aṅgu
lir api | keśahastaḥ keśapāśaḥ | keśa eva hastaḥ pāṇiḥ || 58 ||

lg.l: vyātyukṣīcchāpreritenāmbhasārāt siktā kācit preyasā na pratīpam |
prāgalbhiṣṭāhantum enaṃ navoḍhā hrīr vaiyātyaṃ hanti lajjādhanānām || 59 ||

div.p: vaiyātyaṃ dhṛṣṭatā || 59 ||

kasya kṛtau haravijayaviṣamapadoddyota ekaviṃśaḥ sargaḥ ||
dvāviṃśaḥ sargaḥ |

matpatnī gaṅgā mudhaiva gauryā asūyyate iti krodhād ivāmbhodhirakṣubhyat_ | uttamāṅge śi
rasi | uttabhāny aṅgāni yasyā iti dhvanitam_ || 1 ||

mṛgāṅkam ivānuvavrajuṣā anugatena
|| 2 ||
śeṣaṃ śaṃbhubhuktāvaśiṣṭam_ || 3 ||

ardhoditasya śaśinaḥ pamāgate(?)nārdhana pūrṇa
candrakaraṇāya yojayitum iva jaladhiḥ pratibimbitam ardhaṃ tad abhimukham utkṣiptavān_ || 4 ||

ambaraṃ vāso 'pi | yo hi preyasīm āliṅgitum ūrdhvabāhur utthitaḥ sa tad aprāptyā śo
kād aṃśukam ācchādya bhūmau patati || 7 ||
abhraṃ nabhaḥ || 8 ||
nidāgho gharmaḥ || 10 ||
cakraṃ sudarśanas tena ghaṭanā yogo yasya | ambaraṃ vasanam api | daityādhipo bāṇaḥ || 11 ||
aṅkagā utsaṅgavartinī || 12 ||
ṣaḍviṃśaḥ sargaḥ |

iti dūtīvacanād āgatāḥ preyāṃso madyāni vadhūr apīpyan pāyayām āsuḥ | pibateś caṅ pare
ṇau ‘lopaḥ pibater īccābhyāsasya’ ity upadhālope 'bhyāsasya cettvekṛte 'pīpyann iti rūpam || 1 ||

āvaravyaḥ kalikā iti prasiddhā madhukalaśikāḥ | tā api salīlahaṃsīvad udgrīvāḥ | śu-
ktayaḥ pānapātrāṇi prāṇiviśeṣāś ca | ālukābhir madyadhānībhiḥ kāṃ vā lakṣmīṃ nātanuta sa-
rvām eva tene | vāśabdaḥ pūrvaślokāpekṣayā vākyāntarasamuccaye | anyatra kāñcanamayobhir vālu-
kābhiḥ sikatābhir ity arthaḥ || 2 ||

lg.l: m abhyāgatā nipatitāḥ katham apy athorvyām |

div.p:
adṛṣṭacarī pūrvam adṛṣṭā | ‘bhūtapūrve caraṭ’ | ko-
ṣaś caṣakam || 4 ||

lg.l: kiṃ kāryam atra bhavatā vijahīhi cāpa-
m ity abhyadhād iva rutair madanaṃ dvirephaḥ |

div.p: raṅgac calat | pārī pānapātram || 5 ||
karako madhukalaśaḥ || 6 ||
maireyaṃ madhuviśeṣaḥ | recako bhramaṇam || 7 ||

lg.l: tiṣṭhan puro na kim apatrapase sadoṣaḥ |
ity utpale kalaravair iva huṃ cakāra

div.p:
niravadyo niṣkalaṅkaḥ | sadoṣaḥ saka-
laṅkaḥ sarātriś ca || 9 ||

lg.l: m indur mano malinayiṣyati mā tavāccham |

div.p: kāṃsyaṃ caṣakam eva koṣaḥ kalikā yasya || 11 ||

aṅgu-
libhis taraṅgitaḥ surāpūro yatra tathā kṛtvā caṣakapratibimbitaśaśimūrtim unmārṣṭum abhilaṣantī
āyasyati sma saṃrabdhā babhūva || 12 ||

śītalarajaḥ karpūrapāṃsuḥ | laghutvād ūrdhvam aploṣata plu-
tāni || 13 ||

lg.l: dṛṣṭyā punar madhuni bimbitam akṣi nāryāḥ || 14 ||

div.p:
madhuraiḥ svādubhir manojñaiś ca añcitair manoharair dīrghaiś ca pakṣmabhiḥ kesarair lomabhiś ca
śobhā yasya || 14 ||

teṣāṃ niḥśvāsānāṃ saurabhasya yo 'tiśayas tena vāsanaṃ saṃskāram iva
kartum agre 'tiṣṭhat | ivaśabdasya bhinnakramatve yuktir uktā || 15 ||

lg.l: pāryām adhāvad iva lagnam alaṃ viśuddhyai || 17 ||

div.p:
anyābhi-
dhā sapatnīnāma | rasacchaṭābhir iva dyutibhir āplāvitā pārī śuśubhe || 18 ||

āvarjitaṃ
dattam | udanaṃsīd unnanāma | ‘yamaramanamātāṃ sak ca’ iti sagiṭau || 19 ||

candrasya
mūrtiḥ śarīram | candrasyeva mūrtir yasyāḥ sā ca yoṣit | pādāḥ kiraṇāḥ | pādaś caraṇaḥ | avamarśa-
sparśaḥ | tena prāptena subhagaḥ || 21 ||

masāro maṇiviśeṣaḥ | prītyeva vikasvaraṃ kuvalayam eva
cakṣur yasyāḥ | sodaryaṃ bhrātṛtā | tac ca dvayor api samudrād udgamāt || 22 ||

saṃvādinī
samā tārakā yasya tena tārakāyamāṇenotpalena śobhinaḥ || 24 ||

babhāreti bharaṇaṃ poṣaṇaṃ
dhāraṇaṃ ca | mukulākhyā dṛṣṭiḥ | yaduktam_ - ‘sphuradāśliṣṭapakṣmāgrā mukulordhvapuṭāñcitā |
sukhāmīlitatārā ca mukulā dṛṣṭir iṣyate ||’ mukulānāṃ ca kuḍmalānāṃ dṛṣṭir darśanam||25||

sphuṭamalatvāt sotpalasindhuvārāvataṃsasadṛśam indubimbaṃ candrakāntacaṣakasāmyān na lakṣitaṃ ya|
ttanmadhunotkṣipyamāṇamivāvirbhūtam | tatpṛṣṭhe plavanāt || 26 ||

karkaryaḥ
karikā ālukā ity anye || 29 ||

samāne udare śete sodaryā bhaginī | ‘sodarādyat’
|| 30 ||
kiṃ sahakāremyaḥ saugandhyaṃ kiṃ vā śvāsebhya iti saṃśayāyotaśabdaḥ || 31 ||

lg.l: viśramya kāpi kapiśaṃ pibati sma candra-

div.p: kapiśaṃ madhu || 32 ||

niraṅkuśaḥ svatantro nirastasṛṇiś ca | rāgaḥ prabhā | rañjitaṃ mukhaṃ yatra
yasya ca | nirapekṣā niḥsaṃkocā ghṛṇāśūnyā ca | pariṇamankāye prasarpan_ ājighrāṇaśca(?) |
‘svedaṃ mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ ca madaṃ caiva mataṅgajāḥ | yasyāghrāya vimādyanti tam āhur gandhahastinam_’
|| 33 ||
candrakalaiva tamālapattraṃ tilakaḥ || 34 ||

śuktau taralam utpalaṃ dṛśi tu lulitā
tāraketi sāmyam || 35 ||
citrakāṇi tilakāḥ || 38 ||

trīṇi sthā-
nānyākṣiprabhṛtīni uraḥkaṇṭhaśirāṃsi ca | guṇaḥ śobhā dravyatādiś ca || 39 ||
pakṣmāṇi kesarāṇy api || 43 ||

madirākhyā dṛṣṭiḥ | uktaṃ ca - ‘āghū-
rṇamānamadhyā yā kṣāmā cāñcitalocanā | dṛṣṭir vikasitāpāṅgā madirā taruṇe made’ || 44 ||
surāsavaṃ surābhidhānaṃ madyam || 45 ||

manmathaśarībhūtasya cakṣuṣaḥ saṃdhānāyeva kāntāyāḥ
karapadmaṃ pakṣmaiva puṅkhabhāgas tatkoṭisaṃsparśe lolaṃ babhūva | madavaśād akṣṇaḥ pakṣamaṇi karaspṛṣṭe
jñātadayitayaiva(?) smaraśaraḥ priyaṃ prati saṃdhitsita ity abhiprāyaḥ || 46 ||

vi-
kāsena vilāsaḥ śobhā tanmoṣaṃ majjanakasya madhunaḥ karoti uttaṃsotpalanimīlanāt |
anapekṣya nair ghṛṇyena || 49 ||
tāmraṃ śulbaṃ tasyeva rucir yasya || 51 ||

udbhinnā
vyaktā bālasya kuṭilāṅgulyavānukāriṇī nakhapaṅktir yasyām || 52 ||

akramaṃ
viśarārutayā || 55 ||

padmakoṣo nāmahastaḥ | uktaṃ ca - ‘yasyāṅgulyas tu saralāḥ sahāṅgu-
ṣṭhena kuñcitāḥ | ūrdhvāntyasaṃyutāgrāś ca sa bhavet padmakoṣakaḥ ||’ kuruvindakoṣaṃ padmarāgavi-
śeṣacaṣakam || 56 ||

parisrutsurā | dūrādhiroheṇa prakarṣagatyā | abibharuradhāra-
yan || 58 ||
śitipaṅkaruhaṃ nīlotpalam || 59 ||

adharakānter viśliṣṭabhedaḥ samāno
madasya rāgaḥ prabhā yayoḥ || 60 ||

dṛṣṭer madainaiva raktatvād gotraskhalanajaḥ krodho na dayita-
viṣaye vyaktaḥ viṣādas tu hṛdaye dṛśaḥ stabdhatārakatvena niveditaḥ || 61 ||

lg.l: nūnaṃ bibheda yad asau prasasāda sadyaḥ || 62 ||

div.p:
pu-
ṣpavarṣair natāṅgyā priyatamaḥ stanalagnatvād abhinandita iva || 63 ||

saṃbhṛtya saṃghaṭayya |
nidigdhām upacitām | piculo 'śokavṛkṣaḥ || 64 ||

ārūḍha pākāni pakvāni yāni pha-
lāni tadviṣayavartinaḥ kīrāḥ śukā yāsām | anvitaguṇāḥ sadṛśyaḥ | śukaśirīṣāṇāṃ
tulyavarṇatvāt || 65 ||
śaśiruco 'ṅganāḥ || 66 ||

caturam eva cāturam | prajñā-
ditvād aṇ | pānahetau caturatāratam yam atiśayas tasya bhedo nānātvam anubadhnanti yāḥ | pra-
sādaḥ svacchatā roṣāpagamaś ca || 68 ||

tasyākṣṇaḥ preraṇayā kṛto yaḥ karṇasaṃdher bhaṅgas tadbha-
yeneva || 69 ||

vikasitotpaladarśanena sakhyā kasyāścid anumito madanaḥ | evaṃ cāsya
vikāsasamayaḥ prabhātam | tāvattvayātra rantavyam ity āśayenotpalaṃ vikāsya kāntāyādarśa-
yat | taccālokya sakhyā vaidagdhyād anumitaṃ samyak || 70 ||

aṃśava eva pakṣmāṇi
tai ramyāḥ smitastabakā yeṣāṃ tādṛśā vibhramapallavā yasya tadbhāvaṃ latā iva yo-
ṣito madhor madyasya vasantasya ca prasaṅgam āsādya dadhuḥ || 71 ||

lg.l: yannāyako madam avāpa yathā ca tena

div.p:
tena sapatnīsaṃnidhau
pāyanena yathā mattā na tathā pītena madyena || 72 ||

lg.l: nīlotpale na caṣake na ca mālyapuṣpe |

div.p:
māno 'parādhāsahiṣṇutvaṃ tadrūpo 'valepo madaḥ tatsaṃbhṛtam api dhairyam upoḍhānunayatvān madhunīva ma-
gnam | upoḍhaṃ dhṛtam || 77 ||

bahumato hitasaṃpādanāyādaraṇīyaḥ | atha ca priyatamaḥ
|| 78 ||
galitā mānarug yasyāḥ || 79 ||

utkalikās taraṅgā api | makaraketuḥ
samudro 'pi || 81 ||

lg.l: m aṅgaiḥ punar mṛgadṛśāṃ gurubhir babhūve || 82 ||

div.p:
rāgo 'bhiṣaṅgo 'pi | padāni suptiṅṅantāny api | cetaso mado
vaktrādīnāṃ tu rāgādaya iti virodhābhāsaḥ spaṣṭa eva || 83 ||

anupaplutaḥ saṃdaṣṭakakākali-
prabhṛtigītadoṣarahito rāgaḥ śāḍavādigītaviśeṣo garbhe yatra | rāgaś cānurāgaḥ | tasyānupa-
plutatvam anuttānatā | kalasvarāḥ kākaliprabhṛtayaḥ svarāvayavabhedāḥ śrutayaḥ | tāsām asaṃkī-
rṇatayā kṛtaniyamā hāriṇaś ca ye śrutisamāhārarūpāḥ ṣaḍjādayaḥ svarās taiḥ prasṛtā sāraṇā
uttaramadrādikā mūrchanā yasyās tādṛśī vallakī āśrāvitā vāditā yaiḥ || 84 ||

bhāvo-
'nubandhaś ca veṇuvādanaviśeṣau bhāvasya ca ratyākhyasyānubandhaḥ pravāhaḥ | rāgaṣṭakkakārā-
dir anurāgaś ca || 85 ||

samā srotogatā gopucchā ceti tridhā yatiḥ | dhvaniśūnyaḥ
kālaḥ samapāṇir ardhapāṇir iti trividhaḥ pāṇiḥ | drutamadhyavilambitabhedena tredhaivānuraṇana-
rūpo layaḥ | karatalādayo vibhedā yasya tādṛśasya dhātoḥ vyañjanapūrvasya yadvācyaṃ tadvi-
stareṇa ramyām | catvāro hi dhātavo vistārakaraṇaviśuddhavyañjanapūrvā vyañjanadhātoś calā-
dayo bhedāḥ | uktaṃ ca - ‘vistāraḥ karaṇaś caiva viśuddho vyañjanas tathā | catvāro dhātavo jñeyā
vāditrakaraṇāśrayāḥ ||’ ‘vyañjanadhātau puṣpaṃ karatalaniṣkoṭitaṃ tathotsṛṣṭam | rephe 'nubaddhasaṃ-
jño 'nusvaritaṃ bindur avasṛṣṭam ||’ iti || 86 ||

anekaprakāraḥ kalpaḥ kalpanaṃ yasya tathāvidhena
koṇasya vādanakāṣṭhikāyā hananena madhurasvarā kūrmī trisarikā sairandhrīti prasiddhā || 87 ||
hṛdayaṃ vakṣo manaś ca | bhāvanāvadhānaṃ śraddhā vā || 88 ||

ārdro manoharaḥ | madavaśāt kuṇṭhākṣaratvena
skhalitapadatvāc chuṣka iva | arthaśūnyaṃ hi gītaṃ śuṣkam abhidhīyate | ārdraś ca kathaṃ śuṣka iti
virodhaḥ || 89 ||

śiṣyata iti śeṣam | ‘akartari ca kārake—’ iti ghañ | gītam eva śeṣaṃ
gītaśeṣam | karmasādhanaḥ śeṣaśabdo vidheyavalliṅgaḥ | yathā - ‘mandākinyāḥ payaḥśeṣam’
iti | bhāvasādhanaṃ tu puṃsy eva saṃmataḥ || 90 ||

suratam eva nāṭakaṃ tasya pūrvaraṅgaḥ prastā-
vakatvāt || 91 ||

lg.l: tadābhilaṣyanty asakṛt priyānanān nipātum avyāhati kāpiśāyanam |
niśāntakālāvadhi jāgaraṃ rasād iyeṣa pṛṣṭhaṃ na tu kāpi śāyanam || 92 ||

div.p:
kāpi sundarī priyamukhāt kāpiśāyanaṃ madyam abhilaṣantī ā prabhātā-
j jāgaram aicchat | na tu śāyanaṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ śayanasaṃbandhi talam || 92 ||

lg.l: r mūrchadbhiḥ kṛtasauṣṭhavaṃ rasabharād ākarṇya gītaṃ punaḥ |
premasnigdham apāyayanta rataye tās tv aryamāṇā iva

div.p:
bhāvāveśo gītasya hṛ-
dayapraveśas tena mīlite netre yatra tathā kṛtvā gītam ākarṇya punar apāyayanta tāḥ kāminaḥ |
madyam iti sāmarthyāt ||

iti śrībālabṛhaspatyanujīvino vāgīśvarāṅkasya vidyādhipatyaparanāmno mahākave
rājānakaśrīratnākarasya kṛtau ratnāṅke haravijaye mahākāvye
pānagoṣṭhīvarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaḍviṃśaḥ sargaḥ |

iti rājānakajayānakasūnor alakasya kṛtau haravijayaviṣamapado-
ddyote ṣaḍviṃśaḥ sargaḥ ||
